story:
Who looked happier after winning Olympic medals—bronze medalists or silver medalists?

Did late pick-ups increase or decrease after the daycare instituted a fine for tardiness?

What environmental factor contributed more to an increase in crime rates—the day of the week or the outside temperature?

In this thought-provoking, fun, and engaging game, players will second-guess human nature by predicting what kinds of decisions people will make in unique situations. Each answer is backed up by research, and a special section on each card explains why we act the way we do. But the best part of this game is the discussion it sparks . . . and the way players can use the insights from these cards to understand how they make decisions, and to make better decisions that will enrich their lives.

If you would like to review the detailed rules of the game and understand its mechanics, including the way power cards can be obtained and utilized, please visit our website to see the infographic that we created for you. 

Dan is a Professor of Psychology & Behavioral Economics at Duke University and is dedicated to exploring questions about human behavior in order to help people live more sensible — if not more rational — lives. Dan is a TED speaker, the author of the New York Times bestsellers Predictably Irrational, The Upside of Irrationality and The Honest Truth About Dishonesty, and a founding member of the Center for Advanced Hindsight. 

The proceeds from this game will be used to fund new research conducted by the Center for Advanced Hindsight.

Your support will help us achieve this goal!

  • Back us!
  • Add a second copy to your perk for the most irrational person you know – they won’t get the hint but they will love playing the game.
  • Tell all of your friends to get their own copy, as you won’t be loaning yours to anyone, because we all know people never return things, right?
  • Share! Help us spread the word via the “Share this project” button.
  • Subscribe on our website, follow us on Facebook and Twitter.
  • Send us a note! contact@irrationalgame.com

 

We put a lot of thought into the mechanics and design of the game to make sure it would be fun and educational at the same time.

We are using larger cards (3.5” x 5.75”). These allow players to show the experiment description and illustration to other players, and question cards will be easier to read this way.

 

 

 

We were passionate about the art used in the experiments’ illustrations. 

Each card has a unique illustration created especially for our game by Miki Mottes.

We were fortunate to work with Miki (www.mikimottes.com), a top illustrator who created the amazing art we're using throughout the game and in our campaign. 

Initially, we thought about having a couple of characters who would illustrate the different experiments on the Question Cards. Miki drafted these characters for us to select from:

  • Mustache and Eggplant
  • Duck and Can
  • Fox and Tooth

We liked them all so much that we decided to keep all of them (except for the happy tooth, which was a bit too creepy). Then Miki added Rabtus, the Cactus Rabbit and Cumber, the cucumber. 

This is what the gang looked like in their first group game:

 Credits:

  • Video production and art direction - David Matityahu, www.mostlymotiongraphics.com 
  • Art - Miki Mottes, www.mikimottes.com 
  • Card layout design - Oren Fait, www.orenfait.com 

 

By purchasing the game, you can have fun, learn new things and support Dan's research. 

To order multiple perks, just add the perk amount for each extra perk you'd like. Extra shipping charges may apply.

After you've backed us, you will receive a survey from us that will let you know what the next steps are and verify your details for shipping. Feel free to message us with any questions you might have.

Thank you for your support!

story:
Fletcher stood proudly upon the ridge of the mountain and looked down upon the Blood River, its distinctive reddish colour leeching out from the mountain’s massive iron ore reserves. The iron they refined gave his family both strength and wealth but still the Bone Clans attacked. Three times in the last cycle the Goblins had assaulted his homeland and three times they had been driven back. His Spies told him that they believed the Dwarves of the Blood River to be mining for gold rather than iron and they would continue their assaults until they were successful. The Goblins were stupid … and soon they would be dead. 

 

36 Excellently sculpted Kev Adams Dwarves. A very rare change in design and a rare opportunity to help us bring them back to the gaming table.

 

Godber's Raiding Party

 

Warwick's Champions

 

Boris's Tunnel Skirmishers

 

Rappaport's Mountain Marauders

 

Fletchers Slade Army
 

Risks and challenges

Risks on this project are minimal. We've been casting and making molds for decades. The masters are cast and the mold maker is ready.

This is our first Indiegogo project but our 4th Crowdfunding. We have 3 successful projects under our belt and are getting better every time.

story:
Brother Vinni's Dungeon

Part 1: Dungeon Sisters

Hello, ladies and gentlemen! I am Igor aka Brother Vinni! You probably know me, or at least heard of me.

Our company produces original fantasy and sci-fi 28mm miniatures, which you can find here: http://www.brother-vinni.com/rus/shop.htm#!/~/category/id=5901131&offset=0&sort=normal

Till today we were making and selling standalone figures, that had only 28mm scale in common. It was fun, but we aim higher! Now we are making our own tabletop fantasy wargame, and we need your help. We imagine it as a skirmish game in a fantasy world: small armies of 2-10 miniatures fighting against each other.

At first we plan to make a line of miniatures, then - add rule and printed stuff, accessories and everything else that changes a figure box into a game set.

To this day we sculpted, cast and painted 6 miniatures to give you a taste of the game visuals. If the campaign is successfully funded, we sculpt more according to the plan below.

Concept, scultpting and casting: Brother Vinni Studios

Artwork: Daniil 'Dahr' Kuzmichev

Painting: Roman Tarasov

Story: Dmitry Rommel and Brother Vinni Studios

Translation: Dmitry Rommel


The World Below

The action of the first part of the game takes place in the dungeons.

The flesh of the earth pitted with caves like cheese — with holes. The underground world can compete with the sublunar both area and the amount and variety of creatures inhabiting it. Dungeons complicated and endless, they stretch for thousands of kilometers under the green meadows and forests of the world, being, as it were, his reflection. Huge granite halls in whiling away the Sisters live, replaced with Kobold's labyrinth, those in turn output to the black oily lakes with icy water. Ghoulish creatures live on the shores of these lakes, feeding on pale newts picking seashells from rock crevices. Fiery river that washed the roots of the mountains, generate flaming salamanders and musty corridors beneath the ruins of the ancient city became a haven for nightmarish Flesheaters. Yet surface dwellers come, seeking their doom: from righteous warriors of holy orders, to unscrupulous mercenaries and treasure hunters, they seek to bring fire and steel into the World Below, which has long become a place of eternal war, yet the fights are won and lost in narrow tunnels and nightmarish ruins rather than battlefields. It is here that guile, cunning and magic are worth more than sheer numbers and brute strength.

All of them have something to contend with each other and therefore the underworld is a field of endless war. This is what we try to tell the extent of the forces released us by the Creator.

Welcome to the Dungeon.


Dungeon Sisters

Deep down below the surface lands sprawls a huge maze, a web of catacombs and tunnels where the darkest creatures dwell and terrible acts of cruelty are committed. This is the realm of the Dungeon Sisters, an ancient and sinister sect of female warriors, each of them gifted with eternal beauty and sick imagination. Cries of anguish and lust echo across these dimly lit halls, as whips sting at ivory skin, spiked wheels slowly turn and other, more devious, tools see macabre action. While the Sisters delight in torture and corruption of prisoners, they often willingly take place on racks next to their victims, gleefully embracing pain and disgrace they so eagerly dispense upon others as well. Givers and takers, unrelenting torturers and willing slaves, they are the epitome of two opposites, readily taking place at either end of the whip.

It is in battle where their deadly grace truly shines, however. Barbed lashes and curved daggers, needle-sharp heels and rending talons leave a trail of bloody splashes in their wake as the Sisters perform the dance of death, easily overcoming even the most barbaric or well-trained foes. As a display of their arrogance and sinful beauty, they are barely dressed, their succulent bodies mesmerizing hapless enemies. Any wounds the Sisters may receive only drive them further into the realm of pain-induced bliss.

Dark of soul and evil of mind, the Sisters are little but slaves to their very nature, as they draw power from emotions – anguish and lust being the easiest to bring forth, and certainly the strongest. Should their ever make a pause in their quest for pain and pleasure, they would wither and die... making their utmost depravity a bare necessity.

Come and at take a closer look at the Dungeon Sisters… if you dare!

Miniatures

Descriptions regarding the mechanics of the game, rather relative and may be changed in the future:

  1. YoungerSisters (5 models)
    Hot and conceited, they often ignore armor, exposing their bodies and are proud of them. Fighting half-naked is dangerous, but what is the risk in comparison with the admiring gaze that goes off in the eyes of a dying enemy. The last thing he sees in this life will be your beauty. And trust me, it's not the worst thing that ever imprinted in the dead pupils ..
    Younger Sisters prefer short and razor-sharp weapon. Their arsenal contains of a sickle, curved knives, blades that allow have a close look at the person to whom to kill.
  2. Basic Sisters (5 models) 
    The core of the underground army - quite experienced sister, protected by light armor. Their battle experience allows them to choose the weapons themselves and to the liking of the situation, but generally they prefer heavy sabers and cutlasses.

  3. Silent Guard. (5 models)

    Elite soldiers. Scary opponents, these women are protected with exquisite armor closing their body from the tail hair on the head to the heels of boots. Despite the armor, they move frighteningly fast, attacking like scorpions, and their black naginatas do not know slip, cutting bones like a soft cartilages. During the battle, no sound, no groan, no swearing you hear from under the iron mask of Silent Guard amazons, they fight and die in silence. Even the agony in his own blood cooling is not able to open their mouths. This terrible silence, accompanied by their inhuman cruelty able to scare any opponent up stupor.

  4. Shadows (3 models)

    Generally, throwing weapons used in underground less than on the surface - not the distance to meke showers of arrows for each other. Nevertheless, among the Dungeon Sisters exists a special caste of warriors, preferring to shoot from ambush encounter face to face. They do not wear armor, dressed in matte black suits and prefer seldom to appear on the enemy's eyes. For masking they wearing their hair tails at the rear of the head, not on the top, like a boastful melee sisters who want to look taller on the battlefield. The main weapon of Shadows is a small crossbow with steel arch and a bowstring, woven from the hair of their own owner. Shot from this crossbow breaks muscles, throwing splinters of bone from the wound on the other side. In the melee the fight shadows are completely useless and almost immediately retreat.

  5. Witches (2 models)

    Those sisters who have brains in their head a little more than required for the endless battles and orgies, can become witches. Their arsenal of magic is not very wide, but several deadly spells they use quite confident. Almost all of their magic is based on the flowing blood and the suffering of the witch, so in close combat, they are very vulnerable and try to stay behind.

  6. Executioneress (1 model)

    The overseer with a whip may be added to the band of the Younger Sisters. This experienced lady fighting along with their wards, has also time to watch them, holding too hot-tempered and urging timids with the whip. She increases the combat capability of the group.

  7. Victim Level 1 (2 models)

    The suffering prisoner may be added to the band of Younger and Basic Sisters. She does not participate in combat, but her suffering ignited cruelty and lust in her friends, that enhances the combat capability of the group.

  8. Victim Level 2 (1 model)

    Stationary unit - suffering sister. If this martyr is on the battlefield, Withces can enhance their spells, soaking their voluntarily accepted pain.

  9. Victim 3 levels (altar)

    Stationary unit - the altar with the victim. Located on the field, this sacred altar of Pain fills the hearts of Sisters with thirst for blood, and suffering of the victims are pushing their lust.

  10. Medusa (3 models)

    Physiology of Dungeon Sisters is that they can interbreed and produce offspring with nearly all the inhabitants of their world. A warped mind sometimes pushes them to such experiments that could be born only in a sick imagination of a madman. The fruits of these orgies are often remarkably tenacious and can successfully complete the underground army of its parents. Medusa have absorbed all the most unpleasant quality of those from whom they come: a mad rage and bloodlust of Sisters combined them with a snake composure and quick reflexes. In addition, their sight has a weak hypnotic effect. They are enough smart to use the weapon in the battle, but otherwise they are rather clever animals than intelligent creature. They understand orders badly and often behave absolutely unpredictably.

  11. Queen

    Actually, the commander of the underground army. It has exceptional fighting skills and also can use some spells.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- all figures casted in gray polyurethane resin

- all figures are unassembled and unpainted

- world-wide postage included

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A short list of figures for easy orientation:

  • Younger Sisters (5 models)

  • Basic Sisters (5 models)

  • Silent Guard (5 models)

  • Shadows (3 models)

  • Witches (2 models)

  • Executioneress (1 model)

  • Victim Level 1 (2 models)

  • Victim Level 2 (1 model)

  • Victim Level 3 (altar)

  • Medusa (3 models)

  • Queen


...and some WIP pictures:

	opponents, these women are protected with
	exquisite armor closing their body from the tail hair on the
	head to the heels of boots. Despite the armor, they move
	frighteningly fast, attacking like scorpions, and their black
	naginatas do not know slip, cutting bones
	like a soft cartilages. During the battle,
	no sound, no groan, no swearing you hear from under the iron mask of
	Silent Guard amazons,
	they fight and die in silence. Even the agony in his own blood
	cooling is not able to open their mouths. This terrible silence,
	accompanied by their inhuman cruelty able to scare any opponent up
	stupor.


Shadows (3
	models)
Generally, throwing
	weapons used in underground less than on
	the surface - not the distance to meke showers
	of arrows for each other. Nevertheless,
	among the Dungeon Sisters exists
	a special caste of warriors, preferring to
	shoot from ambush encounter face to face. They do not wear armor,
	dressed in matte black suits and prefer seldom to
	appear on the enemy's eyes. For masking
	they wearing their hair
	tails at the rear of the head, not on the top, like a
	boastful melee sisters who want to look
	taller on the battlefield. The main weapon of Shadows
	is a small crossbow with steel arch and a
	bowstring, woven from the hair of their own owner. Shot from this
	crossbow breaks muscles, throwing splinters of bone from the wound
	on the other side. In the melee the fight shadows are completely
	useless and almost immediately retreat.


Witches
	(2 models)
Those sisters
	who have brains in their head a little
	more than required for the endless battles and orgies, can become
	witches. Their arsenal of magic is not very wide, but several deadly
	spells they use quite confident. Almost
	all of their magic is based on the flowing blood and the suffering
	of the witch, so in close combat, they are very vulnerable and try
	to stay behind.


Executioneress
	(1 model)
The overseer with a whip
	may be added to the band of the Younger
	Sisters. This experienced lady fighting
	along with their wards, has also time to
	watch them, holding too hot-tempered  and
	urging timids with the whip. She
	increases the combat capability of the group.


Victim
	Level 1 (2 models)
The
	suffering prisoner may be added to the band
	of Younger and Basic Sisters. She does not participate in
	combat, but her suffering ignited cruelty
	and lust in her friends, that
	enhances the combat capability of the group.


Victim
	Level 2 (1 model)
Stationary unit -
	suffering sister. If this martyr is
	on the battlefield, Withces
	can enhance their spells, soaking their
	voluntarily accepted pain.


Victim 3 levels
	(altar)
Stationary unit - the
	altar with the victim. Located on the field, this
	sacred altar of Pain fills the hearts of Sisters
	with thirst for blood, and suffering of
	the victims are pushing their lust.


Medusa (3
	models)
Physiology of
	Dungeon Sisters is that they can interbreed and produce offspring
	with nearly all the inhabitants of their world. A warped mind
	sometimes pushes them to such experiments that could be born only in
	a sick imagination of a madman. The fruits of these orgies are often
	remarkably tenacious and can successfully complete the underground
	army of its parents. Medusa have absorbed all the most unpleasant
	quality of those from whom they come: a mad rage and bloodlust of
	Sisters combined them with a snake composure and quick reflexes. In
	addition, their sight has a weak hypnotic effect. They are enough
	smart to use the weapon in the battle, but otherwise they are rather
	clever animals
	than intelligent creature.
	They understand orders badly and
	often behave absolutely unpredictably.


Queen

	Actually, the commander of the underground army. It has exceptional
	fighting skills and also can use some
	spells.




----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- all figures
casted in gray polyurethane resin 

- all figures
are unassembled and unpainted
- world-wide postage
included 


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------A short list of figures for easy
orientation:



Younger Sisters
	(5 models)


Basic Sisters
	(5 models)


Silent Guard
	(5 models)


Shadows (3 models)


Witches
	(2 models)


Executioneress
	(1 model)


Victim Level 1 (2 models)


Victim Level 2
	(1 model)


Victim Level 3
	(altar)


Medusa (3
	models)


Queen

...and some WIP

story:
About this project

 

 

 

Cavern Tavern is a worker (dice) placement and resource management board game that is set in a fantasy world. Each player assumes the role of a worker in the tavern. Your job is to serve drinks, work in the kitchen, do chores, and on top of that try to keep every guest happy, including the nasty and greedy barkeep. Here's a glimpse of the story behind it. 

 

 


Unlocked content from the previous campaign

 

 

 

Cavern Tavern uses worker (dice) placement and resource management mechanics. 

Every player has 4 dice that represents his available actions. On each turn, a player can assign his dice to 1 of the 21 locations in the tavern. These locations require different amount of dice value and each location holds a different reward. The players can choose to place 1 die on a location, combine them in groups to receive bigger rewards, or discard them to receive benefits that will help them advance in the game. So when the player rolls his 4 dice, he has a lot of options where to put them and how to use them, thus forming a strategy and reducing the luck factor to minimum.

The locations are divided into 6 sections: 

1. Main area: Players pick up Orders from guests in this section. 

2. Cellar: The ingredients used to complete orders are located in this section.

3. Kitchen: Players can work in this section to receive rewards.

4. Chores: Players can complete chores in this section to receive rewards.

5. Wizard’s Workshop: Players can seek help for completing their Orders in this section.

6. Nasty the Dwarf’s Office: Players can suck up to the boss and badmouth coworkers in this section.  

During the game, players need to complete their Orders as soon as possible. For each round an Order is late, the Order’s point value decreases.

Late Orders also affect the player’s reputation with the barkeep, Nasty the Dwarf, which can have dire consequences.

Your experience in managing in the Kitchen and doing Chores in the Tavern will be noted as well which can also influence your game advancement.

Throughout the game the players can pick up Items that are left by the Tavern's patrons. These Items are located all over the Tavern and the players can benefit through their clever usage.

Before the game starts, the players will receive a Secret Task from Nasty which will grant them bonus Victory Points at the end of the game for meeting his conditions.

But also there are cards that will make the players' jobs in the Tavern more difficult and they are called Nasty the Dwarf Says cards. By drawing one of these cards the player must fulfill a mandatory task given by Nasty the Dwarf.

Here's a great walkthrough video made by the folks of Tantrum House.

Also, you can check out the video of the rulebook with detailed specifics of the game.

Click here to read the rules.
Coming soon. German, French, Spanish, Italian, Dutch, Serbian and Macedonian translations of the rulebook and the cards. These documents will not be printed and included in the physical copy, however they will be available for everyone to download at our website finalfrontiergames.com

 

We are aware that there is always a risk when backing a new publisher, especially a first time creator. Getting this game in your hands and in perfect condition is not just fulfilling a project to us. It’s fulfilling our dream. So you can rest assured that in the next months this project will be our main focus.

We have spent the past 2 years preparing for this moment because we believe in this project. We published 2 board games in our local market just to get our feet into the industry and learn everything we could. We’ve built a company and gathered experience and fundsso we can invest everything we have in Cavern Tavern.

As you can see, we have invested in professional artwork, video, campaign consultation, and marketing. As first time creators, we’re putting our money where our mouth is to show you that we strongly believe in this project.

But, we've come to the moment where we need your help to make Cavern Tavern a reality. 

Here at Final Frontier Games we like to give the retailers an opportunity to stock our game through this campaign. 

By backing our project you will receive a fair bulk discount and save on shipping as well. Just contact us at contact@finalfrontiergames.com and we’ll form an offer that will suit your needs.

Group Orders 

For group orders of 6+ copies just contact us at contact@finalfrontiergames.com 

Shipping

We are using the Jamey Stegmaier method for fullfilment. We are going to ship the game from two fullfilment centers. One located in the United States and the second in the United Kingdom. The game is US and EU friendly.  

Final Frontier Games is a board game publishing company based in Skopje, Macedonia. Our goal is to bring friends and families closer together in fun and engaging ways. That’s why we make board games. Final Frontier Games was established in 2014 and so far has published 2 board games in Macedonia. Cavern Tavern is our first project for the international market.

Art by Mihajlo Dimitrievski - The Mico

The beautiful art is done by Тхе Мичо, artist of Shipwrights of the North Sea, Raiders of the North Sea, Explorers of the North Sea, Villages of Valeria and many more. Awesome human being and great artist!

And here we are in support of the local gaming community

Main video music:

"Epic Unease" and "Heavy Interlude" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Main video images by Deevad - (CC BY-SA 3.0)

Risks & Challenges

 

First, we want to recognize that there is always a risk when backing a new publisher, especially a first time creator.

You can rest assured that we will handle everything with the highest level of professionalism. From our previous projects for the local market in Macedonia, we have experience printing board games and delivering them to our customers. Also, our artist The Mico has worked on over 20 board games for publishers around the world.

Long before we pushed the launch button on, we made sure that every single detail had been addressed twice. In terms of worldwide shipping and fulfillment, we have done extensive research to reduce our knowledge gap. We’ve contacted many successful publishers, had multiple discussions in groups devoted to publishing and crowdfunding, and read every single article about the subject from industry professionals like James Mathe and Jamey Stegmaier. Also we have a lot of board game publishers and experienced people in crowdfunding and fulfillment on our side, like Tantrum House, providing assistance and making sure every detail is covered. We are also members of the Indie Game Alliance - a collective of independent tabletop game developers that have joined together to promote the latest and greatest indie games and help out each other.

We’ve had extensive discussions with our manufacturing and fulfillment companies and they are ready to produce and deliver the game when the time comes.

We are aware that there are some factors that are outside of our control, things that can delay the project, like labor strikes, Chinese holidays etc, but we have given ourselves extra time to deliver the project in case of unforeseen issues. 

Having said that, we'll be transparent with you for every issue that might occur and how we are resolving them. That, we can promise!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Help us spread the word about the campaign.

Like our Facebook page Final Frontier Games and share this page with your friends. 

Follow Final Frontier Games on Twitter and retweet this post.

Follow Final Frontier Games on Instagram.

Subscribe to our newsletter.

story:
More than a century ago, the Ragweed Tumble was a mundane, ordinary sort of place called Goldacre forest. Then, everything abruptly changed when the benign, clement woodlands became afflicted with the kind of verdant overgrowth befitting a dense jungle. The prolific spread of plants and vegetation culminated in huge, vine-like growths that towered the height of trees emerging throughout the forest.

Fast forward to today, and the tumble appears to be in a state of flux once more. Though this time, the metamorphosis is far more disturbing and has much more troubling implications. The forest appears to be expanding again after a century of harmonious balance. A surge of violent earthquakes and tremors shake the treetops, causing sinkholes and fissures to form in the forest floor. Scattered reports speak of vicious animal attacks. Paths are voraciously consumed by undergrowth. And, an inexplicable malaise spreads throughout the tumble like wildfire.

Linora Luddington, the leader of the forest's settlement of Raggers Hollow, has set out the call for 'brave adventurers and intrepid dungeoneers' to seek her out in the tumble. For reasons their own, the PCs have heeded that call. Though, what awaits them beneath the murky canopy of a corrupted realm of trees, magic, and fey remains to be seen.

"Too good to miss, Thunder of the Thorn is packed to bursting with carefully considered materials just begging to be brought to life at your table."

Thunder of the Thorn is...

  • ...A 1st-to-5th-level adventure that is presented over an estimated 160-pages

  • ...Setting-neutral/agnostic and built from the ground up for use with the 5th Edition of the world's oldest roleplaying game, Dungeons & Dragons 

  •  ...Complete with thorough, lavish, and intricate gazetteers on the Ragweed Tumble and the village of Raggers Hollow–exploring both in intimate detail

  •  ...Packed with pages and pages of entirely new, adventure-specific rules, such as those used for for the handling of mental manifestations and physical corruptions; classes, backgrounds, features, and campaign traits.

  • ...Bursting with extensive tables and charts that provide dozens of random encounters, events, treasures, discoveries, and more besides.

  • ...Extensive and provides lengthy appendices that contain original monsters, bespoke NPCs, and unique magic items.

  • ...Greatly expandable and easily adaptable, providing fully-developed Side Quests; as well as quest outlines, suggestions, and guidelines–which we're calling Quest Primers.

  • ...premium and benefits from both triple-A production values and high-quality, full-colour artwork and cartography throughout.

While you're here, why not check out our two new 5th Edition classes? We think they're awesome, and we're sure you will too! Click the banners below to grab them for FREE!

Slayers are swift-footed masters of battlefield navigation that channel the momentum from one kill into tearing other foes asunder. This complete, level 1-20 class also offers 5 unique and lethal Slayer Callings to help set each slayer apart from their deadly peers. 

Soulbound are wretched and accursed souls whose fate and very existence has become embroiled with a Cursed Artifact. One of the most wildly ambitious classes released for 5th Edition to date, each soulbound is mechanically and thematically unique based on the physical form that their artifact takes, its origin, and the concept of its creator–allowing for unparalleled customisation.

Thunder of the Thorn itself is due out in July. However, those who want the Legacy rewards offered through Everything DeepDark (Digital) and Everything DeepDark (Digital + Physical) can expect those to ship much sooner.

You can also find us elsewhere on the web with the following links:

Please feel free to get in touch with us via direct message or by emailing me directly at daniel@deepdark-designs.co.uk.

"Est 2015, DeepDark Designs LTD is a game design studio and publishing house that writes adventures and rule supplements for your favourite tabletop roleplaying games"

Sounds great, but what does that mean in practice?

"In truth, we're a small business that's run by two brothers, Daniel & Sam, who once had 'proper jobs', but decided that we liked writing RPG supplements more. It doesn't seem like it, but that was quite a few years ago now. When we set out on this journey back in September of 2015, we were, admittedly, clueless. Neither of us have any background in publishing (indie or otherwise) or in the tabletop RPG industry, we'd never used Photoshop, and we'd never even heard of InDesign. Our credentials at that time amounted to our experiences at the table as gamers and game masters, and a couple of self-published novels that I put out shortly before founding DeepDark Designs. But, we're smart people, and we don't give up easily (or at all really).

Since then, we've worked tirelessly to hone our art. Working, on average, 100 hours a week. A typical day for us involves getting up at 03.45 in the morning, heading out at 04.40, and returning home around 20.40-21.00 (with an extra 2-3 hours in bed at the weekends, thank goodness). We work elsewhere 3 hours each day Monday to Friday but, the rest of the time, we're here in the office, at our desks, come rain or shine. We've been doing that for years now. Why? Because we're passionate as all hell about what we do. And, we think it's starting to show in the quality of what we're able to produce. But, that's for you to decide, not us.

 Sam and myself can't wait to show you the fruits of our labours, and it means the absolute world to the pair of us to be able to do so. Thank you for supporting us in whatever capacity you're able to do so, and for joining us on this journey!" - Daniel McDonald, Director, DeepDark Designs

Though there are risks inherent to any venture of this nature, we do not foresee there being any major hurdles to releasing Thunder of the Thorn on time. Typically, the biggest stumbling blocks during fulfilment relate to things that need to be outsourced, where we have less direct control over them and it's harder to accurately predict deliverables. However, in this instance all of the outsourced work (cartographic illustrations, cover art, other artwork, etc) is completed already. In fact, around 65% of the book is actually finished and ready for release at this time.

While delays are always possible, we believe that we've budgeted sufficient time to get everything else done in preparation for launch - especially as none of the stretch goals we unlocked during the campaign should delay Thunder of the Thorn.

story:
A Short Summary

We've decided to SCRAP IT ALL and start a brand new with YOU as center-stage! What Do we mean? Long ago the PV* (short for POWERVERSE) had a line-up of heroes slated to STRIKE, SLASH, and PUNCH their way to victory as the CROSSPLAY deck's starting line-up. Unfortunately, but understandably, some of those characters have moved on to other ventures. Of course, we at the PV were saddened to see them go... But, after some thought, we came up with what we think is an even BIGGER and possibly even BETTER solution!

We are throwing out the cards we had planned for this deck and opening it up to YOU, YOUR heroes and the public at large!!!

 

THAT'S RIGHT!!! Battle friends, family, co-workers, and fellow geekdom

with YOUR OWN CHARACTERS! 

The POWERVERSE™ has been known for bringing indie comic characters and creators together to form some of the most exciting crossover events and new universes. Now The PV* is doing the same with its CROSSPLAY collectible card game! With CROSSPLAY "YOU" get-in-the-game by allowing you to place your hero or villain in the deck, creating, by extension, an amalgamation that is a game-changer. 

 

 

What's Your "TYPE?"

Character cards fall into one of four character classes:

CHAMPION: 
These heroes are your brightly colored icons of hope!

DEFENDER:
These heroes are your darker, more gritty heroes that get the job done!

TECH:
These are the gadget wielding, armor-wearing, computer hacking types!

COSMIC:
The name says it all. These are the godly powerful titans of space and time!

 

CARD LAYOUT

Each PV CROSSPLAY DECK will contain battle cards of every indie character submitted. To say this will create a unique collection of playable indie cards is an understatement! This makes every card and each deck collection a rare bird.  As indie heroes and creators gain popularity and comic exposure, many break out to higher visibility and fame.  Having one of these heroes' early crossplay cards is like holding comic history gold. 

 

CHARACTER SHEET EXAMPLE

Fans Will clammer to read through all the stats, histories, and powers, on each character-sheet page packed inside this deck's 101 CROSSPLAY SOURCEBOOK.

Each page is jammed full of mouth-watering information, surely to tempt any indie fan to search and hunting down more content featuring your character.

Players and readers will learn your hero's powers and histories at an easy glance and short read.

The mega 101 CROSSPLAY SOURCEBOOK will feature all the heroes and villains YOU submit!

Battle Dime Matt

Lay your battle cards out and face your opponent and Full BATTLE DIME ACTION!

Get The Story and The Instructions All-In-One!

Enjoy the read as the first half of this instructional comic book is an actual illustrated story It explains hat the BATTLE DIME is and ho your heroes have gotten pulled inside its insidious grip!

SEE THE CARD PROOFS OF THE ORIGINAL LINE-UP!

 

GAMEPLAY TUTORIAL

This video contains the original line-up of characters created by great indie creators but are no longer apart of the FULL THROTTLE JUMP-IN card game. The presence is for gameplay examples only! https://youtu.be/NDZTE9dvziY?t=126

 

IF YOU LIKE HAT YOUVE SEEN, THEN PICK A PERK, SEND YOUR CHARACTER OR CHARACTERS IN, AND LETS CROSSPLAY!


 

 

Risks & Challenges

The game design has all been done. We've found the perfect high-quality game manufacture for the battle cards and their packaging.

The art production could run slightly longer than expected but if e reach above our goal, the hiring of more artist may be possible to meet our deadline faster

The art production could run slightly longer than expected but if e reach above our goal, the hiring of more artist may be possible to meet our deadline faster

story:
Air Deck 2.0 - The ultimate travel playing cards

Our mission is to make the ultimate travel playing cards. After the success of our first Air Deck campaign, we’ve been busy figuring out how we could improve on our original Air Deck. After 18 months of work, and great feedback, here are our five new designs: 

 

Our five new designs: Classic, Warp Speed, Astronauts, Plus Plus and Tropicana

 

Key Features:

  • 52 Playing Cards + 2 jokers
  • Waterproof and washable
  • Compact travel friendly size
  • Light weight
  • Durable heavy-duty 'casino quality' 0.31mm PVC
  • Premium printing
  • Slightly textured on both sides for better handling 
  • Sturdy 0.4mm waterproof synthetic paper tuck box 
  • Playing card size : 3.43 x 1.26 inches (87 x 32mm)

 

Air Deck 2.0 easily fits on small surfaces, such as a plane tray table

 

What's New?

Air Deck 2.0 is made with the same high-quality materials as the original, but we've made a couple of upgrades (apart from the new look):  

  • Our new decks are designed so they’re even more resilient to wear and tear.  
  • The boxes (including our current 1st generation Air Decks) are upgraded to .4mm waterproof synthetic paper, which makes them more durable than the .3mm we shipped with the original campaign. 
  • The ink on the box is now more resistant to scratching.
  • We'll be planting mangrove trees to offset any CO2 emitted from production and shipping of the cards.

 

By Travelers for Travelers

The idea for the original Air Deck was conceived by fellow globetrotters Ursus Negenborn and Rune Kippervik while traveling South East Asia. We love playing cards, and we just couldn’t find a deck that was perfect for carrying at all times. As we’re big fans of optimization, we decided to create the ultimate playing cards for travelers ourselves. 

 

The Air Deck founders

 

Quality

With the Air Deck 2.0 we did not want to compromise on quality. We went to several of the world’s best manufacturers of premium casino cards and asked for the best materials they could provide. In the process of creating the ultimate travel deck, we tried out over 50 different high-end plastic materials. The materials were taken through scratch, bending and handling tests to identify the best candidate. Finally, we ended up with a premium ‘casino quality’ PVC that has all the properties we want for our deck.

 

While paper playing cards tear, stain, bend and break easily, Air Deck 2.0 is extremely durable

The cards are 100% waterproof, so you can even use them in the pool or the bathtub

 

Handling

In the process of selecting the material we sought advice from several playing card professionals, to help us find the optimal material and design. The end result is a deck that shuffles and handles like you expect professional cards to do. The cards are slightly textured on on both sides to provide excellent handling.

 

The Air Deck 2.0 handles well and shuffles easily

 

Design

We created the new designs for Air Deck 2.0 with the wonderful feedback we’ve received from our community. 

Warp speed, Astronauts, Plus Plus and Tropicana playing cards come with the same minimalist fronts as the original white decks. For our new classic design, we’ve given the jack, queen, king and the joker a more traditional look. 

Despite their smaller width, the cards are as easy to read as a standard sized decks. The full-sized length ensures that it also handles much like a full size deck, and the narrower width makes the deck fit nicely in the palm of your hands.

 

Warp Speed, Astronauts, Plus Plus and Tropicana Playing Cards have a minimalist look

Our Classic design has traditional looking face cards

 

A Carbon Positive Deck

We love traveling this beautiful blue ball we call home, and we believe we should care for it as best we can. There’s only one earth after all. The Air Deck 2.0 is an environmentally conscious product to begin with, as it contains almost half the materials of its competitors. In addition, we’ll also offset any CO2 that’s emitted from the production and shipping of the project, by planting mangrove trees in Myanmar with Worldview International Foundation. Mangrove trees are pretty awesome, as they’re one of the most effective tools to bind CO2 to the soil and prevent it from escaping into the atmosphere. They’re ten times more effective than most other tree species, and as a bonus, they also help sustain coastal ecosystems, protect the shorelines from damage by storms and acts as a filter to maintain water quality. The more decks that gets pledged, the more trees will be planted. 

 

Risk and Challenges

The designs of the cards have been finalized, and we’ve made the prototypes you see in the video. Since this is our second project, we’ve ironed out the kinks, and we feel confident that we can deliver a great product. Logistics has already been worked thoroughly out, and we will ship tracked to all customers, to ensure a reliable delivery. Our factory is standing by, and will start production as soon as we are funded. As with any project, unforeseen events can occur, but we've done everything we can to keep unknown factors to a minimum. As we are continuously improving our products, there could be minor adjustments to the decks seen in the video.
