story:
Paypal Pledges: 850€

Total Funding: 4252€ 142%

Updated 08:00 01/09/2020 GMT

 

Standard Template Library

Armored Might

 

In the Beginning...

I found my love for building models when I got into model kits almost 30 years ago, and I've been engaged in the mini hobby in some form or another for the past 25+ years, mainly focusing on Tabletop Wargaming. Throughout my hobbyist career one thing has remained constant, my love for customization and converting. When Resin Printing became readily available I immediately jumped in. Soon after I was using my work related CAD skills for something useful :)

3D Printing your Modular Armored Might

This campaign will focus on bringing to life my vision of Sci-Fi Tanks of various sizes, and of course all Modular and with lots of options, allowing the avid Modeler or Wargamer to 3d print and field tanks with limitless configurations.

All tanks will be Printable in a Resin Printer with a print volume of at least 68x120x150mm, like an Anycubic Photon or Elegoo Mars. They'll also be Magnet ready, using only 3x1mm and 5x2 Magnets for turrets weapons and hatches, as well as propulsion systems. To take customization a little further, there will be various options for some cosmetic glue-on parts.

#Edit 30-08-20: Printers with Z limit of 130 like the Phrozen Sonic Mini can also be used (specific files for these will be provided)

 

The Ultimate Goal

I want to continue developing this line of models with new designs, and go one step further  and offer them outside the 3d Printing community. To that end, this campaign will help me gauge the interest in the design, concept and the potential for resin casting.

 

What You Get

Digital Product: As soon as the campaign ends and funds have been cleared you will receive 3d Printable files, already cut and sized for Resin Printing in STL format. Please note No Physical models will be delivered. The STL Files provided are for personal use.  Please see Rules, Terms and Conditions at the bottom.

Core Set / Stretch goals: The Campaign will be split between a Core Set and Stretch Goals, unlocked by funding. All Backers will get the Core Set plus all unlocked Stretch Goals, described bellow.

Scale: The default scale of the Models is  32mm / 28mm Heroic.

Flexible Funding: This Campaign will run as Flexible Funding option, meaning any backers will get the Core Set Models at least. There is no risk of the campaign failing to gather funds.

 

New funding options. Paypal

Indiegogo doesn't accept Paypal, however, that option is still a possibility. To that end, I've created an e-mail account to handle all Paypal Pledges.

How it works:

I'll add a section at the top of the project description with "Paypal Pledges" and a "Total Funding" line. This new Total Funding will help unlock all the stretch goals.

Strike Fast Strike Hard Perk (SFSH) will have a separate pool, limited for the first 10 Backers.

Send me an e-mail to armoredmightcf@gmail.com, and I'll write back acknowledging your pledge and indicating as well if you're a SFSH Backer or not. When all SFSH slots are gone I'll also update the Campaing that that options is unavailable going forward.

At 20:00 GMT I'll update the Campaign's front page with all changes regarding funding and stretch goals unlocked.

At the end of the campaign I'll send Payment Request From Paypal to the e-mail that you used to make your pledge, for the same values as if you were Indiegogo Backers.

A link to the Campaign's STL Files will be sent to Paypal Backers at the same time as Indiegogo Backer

 

 

Core Set

Multi Role Heavy Vehicle (MRHV)

  • Main Hull (Split in 2 for Printing)
  • Tracked Propulsion System Side Hulls (Split in 2 for Printing)
  • Grav Propulsion System Side Hulls (Split in 2 for Printing)
  • 2 Frontal Slot Options (Hatch or Fixed Turret with 3 Weapon Options)
  • 4 Hatch Variants
  • 2 Frontal Door Options (Plain/Reinforced)
  • 3 Exhaust Variants
  • 2 Main Side Door Options (Weapon Mount or Small Door)
  • 2 Access Side Door Option ( Large Door or Weapon Mount)
  • Heavy Sponson Turrets ( 2 Styles, 3 Weapon Options)
  • Light Sponson Turrets (2 Styles, 2 Weapon Options)
  • Modular Top/Turret Mount (3 Options)
  • Light Main Turret (2 Main Weapon Options and 2 Coaxial Options)
  • Heavy Main Turret (3 Weapon Options)
  • AAA Point Defense System (2 Options)
  • Fixed Frontal Turret and Heavy Sponson Turret Weapon Compatilibity (5 Weapon Options in total)
  • Commander's Cupola Mounted Support Weapons (2 Weapon Options)
  • Blank Weapon Mounts for remixing your own Weapons (Unlimited Possibilities!!)

Examples of Builds

  • MRHV Prowler II Heavy Battle Tank/Assault Transport Configuration
  • MRHV Revenant Armored Personnel Carrier Configuration
  • MRHV Slayer Armored Fighting Vehicle Configuration

 

 

 

* Not all weapons or Options are Shown

 

Stretch Goals

All backers will get the Core Set plus any of the following unlocked stretch goals:

High Mobility Multipurpose Vehicle - HMMV Branch unlocked at 3.000€

  • Common Aspects to all HMMV's
    • Grav Propulsion System with 3 Grav Emitters Configurations
    • MRHV Heavy and Light Sponson Turret Compatibility
    • MRHV and HMMV Hatch Compatibility
    • Rear Access Ramp

   1 - 3.000€ - HMMV Variant 1 - Myrmidon TrV Configuration

  • Modular Top (Turret Mount or Top Cargo Hatch)
  • 5 New Heavy Sponson Turret Weapons

   2 - 3.000€ - HMMV Variant 2 - Wolverine FsAT Configuration

  • New Light Main Turret (3 Weapon Options)
  • 3 New Light Sponson Turret Weapons

   3 - 3.000€ - HMMV Propulsion System 2 - Wheeled Propulsion System

  • Rear Wheels Cover Option

    • MRHV and HMMV Hatch Compatibility

    • Optics or Radar Option

  • New Main Turret

* Pictures of complete models are examples of stretch goal elements application.

MRHV Dimensions
101mm Wide x 172mm Long x 76m Tall
+28mm Wide with Both Heavy Turret Sponsons
+17mm Tall with Main Turret

87mm Wide x 146mm Long x 56mm Tall
+28mm Wide with Both Heavy Turret Sponsons
+17mm Tall with Main Turret

AMV Dimensions
72mm Wide x 126mm Long x 50mm Tall
+28mm Wide with Both Heavy Turret Sponsons
+17mm Tall with Main Turret

 

 

Experience, Risks & Challenges

  • With more than 15 years experience in Industrial CAD designing, and 25+ years model hobbying, I have a good grasp of how to make models that are easy to build while at the same time, producing seamless joints to minimize work during the building stage.  I've been successfully making 3D Conversion Bits and Vehicles for 2 years. I also collaborated with The Makers Cult as a Guest Maker in May 2020.
  • All models apart from Stretch goal 10 are ready. I'm also running this campaign in Flexible Funding Option, meaning any backers will get the Core Set Models at least. There is no risk of the campaign failing to gather funds.
  • Stretch goal 10 will require more work and extensive test printing to ensure a quality product. As such those models will be delivered as they are completed, later in the year.

 

Copyright Disclaimer

Names and Design Style, are of ACE Minis imagination, inspired on real world vehicles. Any resemblance to existing art depictions or existing models is purely coincidental.

 

IMPORTANT: Rules, Terms and Conditions

All files provided by this campaign with my Backers are meant for you as a Backer and no one else. By downloading content made by me (STL's, shared links), you accept this Agreement and agree to be bound by its provisions. If you do not accept or agree with these terms, do not download the content I provide:

You may only use the content provided by me (STL's and their location Links) for personal use, and you are not allowed to distribute or sell them, nor the prints.
You can cut/resize my files to better fit your printer but you can't share those derivatives (as the original files).
You can't edit my 3D Files (stl) or use portions of them to create new Content for Public Use.
My miniatures, any other kind of 3D file I release or portions of my files can't be used in any other project, Indiegogo, Kickstarter, Patreon, or any other crowdfunding platform or sold in a "box".
 You can't make cast/molds of my models, any kind of mass production is prohibited.
You can, of course, take photos, make live streams and video with my models (ideally to Paint sessions or Showing 3D printer results) as long as you state that the models had been made by me. In this case, promoting my 3DCults and CGTrader Store would be greatly appreciated!
All copyrights belong to ACE Minis, NO rights are assigned or transferred to the end-user. My designs are protected by intellectual property laws.

 

Acknowledgments

I'd like to thank The Makers Cult and everyone on the Grim Dark Sci-Fi Makers Discord Community and in particular Papa Behre's Grim Dark Gaming (@papabehre on Facebook) and OrionRS, for all the support you guys have given me. Thank you!
story_txt:
Paypal Pledges: 850€
Total Funding: 4252€ 142%
Updated 08:00 01/09/2020 GMT
 
Standard Template Library
Armored Might
 
In the Beginning...
I found my love for building models when I got into model kits almost 30 years ago, and I've been engaged in the mini hobby in some form or another for the past 25+ years, mainly focusing on Tabletop Wargaming. Throughout my hobbyist career one thing has remained constant, my love for customization and converting. When Resin Printing became readily available I immediately jumped in. Soon after I was using my work related CAD skills for something useful :)
3D Printing your Modular Armored Might
This campaign will focus on bringing to life my vision of Sci-Fi Tanks of various sizes, and of course all Modular and with lots of options, allowing the avid Modeler or Wargamer to 3d print and field tanks with limitless configurations.
All tanks will be Printable in a Resin Printer with a print volume of at least 68x120x150mm, like an Anycubic Photon or Elegoo Mars. They'll also be Magnet ready, using only 3x1mm and 5x2 Magnets for turrets weapons and hatches, as well as propulsion systems. To take customization a little further, there will be various options for some cosmetic glue-on parts.
#Edit 30-08-20: Printers with Z limit of 130 like the Phrozen Sonic Mini can also be used (specific files for these will be provided)
 
The Ultimate Goal
I want to continue developing this line of models with new designs, and go one step further  and offer them outside the 3d Printing community. To that end, this campaign will help me gauge the interest in the design, concept and the potential for resin casting.
 

What You Get
Digital Product: As soon as the campaign ends and funds have been cleared you will receive 3d Printable files, already cut and sized for Resin Printing in STL format. Please note No Physical models will be delivered. The STL Files provided are for personal use.  Please see Rules, Terms and Conditions at the bottom.
Core Set / Stretch goals: The Campaign will be split between a Core Set and Stretch Goals, unlocked by funding. All Backers will get the Core Set plus all unlocked Stretch Goals, described bellow.
Scale: The default scale of the Models is  32mm / 28mm Heroic.
Flexible Funding: This Campaign will run as Flexible Funding option, meaning any backers will get the Core Set Models at least. There is no risk of the campaign failing to gather funds.
 
New funding options. Paypal
Indiegogo doesn't accept Paypal, however, that option is still a possibility. To that end, I've created an e-mail account to handle all Paypal Pledges.
How it works:
I'll add a section at the top of the project description with "Paypal Pledges" and a "Total Funding" line. This new Total Funding will help unlock all the stretch goals.
Strike Fast Strike Hard Perk (SFSH) will have a separate pool, limited for the first 10 Backers.
Send me an e-mail to armoredmightcf@gmail.com, and I'll write back acknowledging your pledge and indicating as well if you're a SFSH Backer or not. When all SFSH slots are gone I'll also update the Campaing that that options is unavailable going forward.
At 20:00 GMT I'll update the Campaign's front page with all changes regarding funding and stretch goals unlocked.
At the end of the campaign I'll send Payment Request From Paypal to the e-mail that you used to make your pledge, for the same values as if you were Indiegogo Backers.
A link to the Campaign's STL Files will be sent to Paypal Backers at the same time as Indiegogo Backer
 
 
Core Set
Multi Role Heavy Vehicle (MRHV)

Main Hull (Split in 2 for Printing)
Tracked Propulsion System Side Hulls (Split in 2 for Printing)
Grav Propulsion System Side Hulls (Split in 2 for Printing)
2 Frontal Slot Options (Hatch or Fixed Turret with 3 Weapon Options)
4 Hatch Variants
2 Frontal Door Options (Plain/Reinforced)
3 Exhaust Variants
2 Main Side Door Options (Weapon Mount or Small Door)
2 Access Side Door Option ( Large Door or Weapon Mount)
Heavy Sponson Turrets ( 2 Styles, 3 Weapon Options)
Light Sponson Turrets (2 Styles, 2 Weapon Options)
Modular Top/Turret Mount (3 Options)
Light Main Turret (2 Main Weapon Options and 2 Coaxial Options)
Heavy Main Turret (3 Weapon Options)
AAA Point Defense System (2 Options)
Fixed Frontal Turret and Heavy Sponson Turret Weapon Compatilibity (5 Weapon Options in total)
Commander's Cupola Mounted Support Weapons (2 Weapon Options)
Blank Weapon Mounts for remixing your own Weapons (Unlimited Possibilities!!)

Examples of Builds

MRHV Prowler II Heavy Battle Tank/Assault Transport Configuration
MRHV Revenant Armored Personnel Carrier Configuration
MRHV Slayer Armored Fighting Vehicle Configuration

 
 
 

* Not all weapons or Options are Shown

story:
How did everyone in your party meet? What alliances or tensions exist? Who screwed over who and what will you do about it?

For Fifth Edition (all editions really), Pathfinder, and other fantasy RPG systems, the Party Backstory Generator solves this problem quickly and easily. This is a simple, straightforward guide of limitless customization.

Build meaningful alliances and tensions between multiple party members with this map making, backstory and one-shot off-night story builder. “Choose two characters…” – it’s the prompt in this unique book that will bond your party in fun and meaningful ways. This book doesn’t create individual characters. It solely focuses on unifying your players with randomized background, conflicts, skills, and tragedies.

Do you need a Game Master to use this book? Nope! If your party wants to use this book without a Game Master, you can take it and create your own backstory by yourselves.  

Suitable for all ages.

 

What's in the book?

  • Over 300 randomized and detailed alliances or conflicts that build on each other - tables, drop-tables, and unique location attributes. Each random event compounds upon the next so each reuse is unique 
  • Fillable pages for Characters, Relationships, Events, and Locations
  • A tabbing system for easy locating of related characters and events
  • Event-based dice drop-tables that turn your shared map into a usable game board
  • 30 illustrations
  • Cover by Luke Eidenschink 
  • Sturdy 70 pound paper 
  • PDF is printable and reusable 
  • Hardcover is professionally printed
  • Lots of replayability 
  • Suitable for all ages

What's NOT in the book

Anything that creates individual playable characters. There's plenty of great resources for that. This is all about the party. That said, the book does create non-playable characters that the GM can use to enrich their story or campaign. 

Please not that, even though each decision and choice compounds on one another, the GM has a lot of freedom to pick and choose which details to insert into the backstory. The narrative compounds, not the tables per say. So you, the GM, can absolutely steer the story wherever you want. 

Step 1

Everyone sits down with their pre-made characters and collectively draws a map of where they are from. With the guidance of the Game Master, they take turns and flesh out details of a place (town or city or anything) that they all visit in the area. They take turns drawing and building the world.

Step 2

Roll dice to generate hundreds of options that compound as the backstory builds: trades, loot, friendships, family, romance, lore, education, property, mysteries, and more. Each player takes a turn as they familiarize areas, meet locals, and acquire property. With each roll, relationships develop, compound, and grow in complexity. The GM is free to steer the prequel narrative in any direction they want.

Step 3

Once enough locations and events are created on the map, the map itself turns into a playable drop table where more random content can occur. This is one of the most fun parts of the book because your players see their map become an interactive space. You'll be propted to drop dice on the map to generate battles, calamity, new locations, and more. The map is a living document of your collective backstory. 

Step 4

Return to the map on off-nights to go back in time to create more backstory and feed details into your campaign.

What else?

The Party Backstory Generator is also a tool for the Game Master to keep track of backstory content with easy-to-track pages with tabs. Fillable pages help detail characters, locations, events, tensions, and alliances.

story:
We developed our first model in 2015, the inspiration of our trademark WOODEN.CITY

With the development of new models due to our growing experience has helped us move forward with our ideas.

 

Write to us: woodencity.startup@gmail.com

In order to develop, create and manufacture our 3D wooden construction sets we use high-precision laser equipment.

Each produced model is tested by our experts.

WOODEN.CITY construction sets have been thoroughly designed and tested each set includes detailed step-by-step instructions.

Main characteristics of WOODEN.CITY 3D puzzles:

Material – environmentally friendly birch plywood;

Rotates with help of a rubber motor;

Assembly does not require glue;

Packaging – wooden box;

Recommended for the children aged 14 years old.

     Models WOODEN.CITY are a great present for any occasion!

 

 

 

One of the oldest attractions, known to everyone since childhood, is “FERRIS WHEEL”.

More than 120 years ago the project of the wheel with cabins for observation seemed impossible. But a young engineer-creator believed in his dream.

Do you want to try yourself as innovator and plunge into the atmosphere of the previous century?

Once you've opened the wooden box and breathed in the air smelling like the carpenter's workshop, the mechanical model “FERRIS WHEEL” will take over your imagination while helping to develop logical thinking.

“WOODEN.CITY” 3D puzzle is an exciting construction set with open mechanism. The assembly does not require any glue. Press the parts and assemble in accordance with the instructions.

Several turns of the key and the rubber motor of “FERRIS WHEEL” is started! It triggers off the gears, among which there is a flywheel and a real planet gear. 

The operating time is 1 minute. The trigger lever on the right side can be used to stop the movement of the wheel.

At the bottom of the patterned stand there is a secret coin box

Secret coin box

 

Construction set features:

Model size L*B*H, mm - 220*260*322;

Packing size, mm - 355*240*51;

Brutto, kg - 2,350;

It is started with a special key;

Rotates with help of the rubber motor;

The operating time from one start is 1 minute;

There is a trigger lever;

Assembly does not require any glue;

Number of the parts - 429;

Assembly time - 8 hours.

 

Green meadow, birds in the blue sky and “MILL” is a traditional European landscape.

As soon as you open a brand wooden box smelling as a carpenter's workshop, the mechanical model “MILL” will take you imagination.

Several turns of the key and the rubber motor of “MILL” is started! It triggers off the gears, among which there is a flywheel.

The operating time from one start is 1 minute. On the left there is a trigger lever used to stop movement of the MILL.

But wait, there is more! At the bottom of the patterned stand there is a secret coin box.

Construction set features:

Model size L*B*H, mm - 327*373*135;

Packing size, mm - 355*240*40;

Brutto, kg - 1,600;

It is started with a special key;

Rotates with help of the rubber motor;

The operating time from one start is 1 minute;

There is a trigger lever;

Assembly does not require any glue;

Number of the parts - 222;

Assembly time - 7 hours.

 

Is it a mechanical watch? Wrong. It is the model of “KINETIC PICTURE”! Start the mechanism with a special key and the optical illusion will take your imagination!

Open the brand wooden box and after two or three fascinating evenings of leisure you will surprise you guests with an unusual moving picture.

Several turns of the key and the rubber motor of the “KINETIC PICTURE” is started!

It triggers off the gears. You may observe the rotation process.

With help of the trigger lever on the right you may regulate the tension of the rubber band and rotation speed.

Construction set features:

Model size L*B*H, mm - 340*224*62;

Packing size, mm - 355*240*40;

Brutto, kg - 1,250;

It is started with a special key;

Rotates with help of the rubber motor;

The operating time from one start is 1 minute;

There is a trigger lever;

Assembly does not require any glue;

Number of the parts - 185;

Assembly time – 6 hours.

 
 

The real world of illusions on your wall! A find for modern design and retro style in the interior. "MECHANICAL PICTURE" 3D puzzle by “WOODEN.CITY” with an open mechanism.

Open the brand wooden box and after two or three fascinating evenings of leisure you will surprise you guests with an unusual moving picture.

"WOODEN.CITY" 3D puzzle is a construction set made of environmentally friendly materials with an open mechanism. The assembly dos not require any glue. Press the parts from the boards and assemble according to the instructions.

Several turns of the key and the rubber motor of the “MECHANICAL PICTURE " is started! It triggers off the gears. You may observe the whole rotation process. With help of the trigger lever on the right, it is possible to adjust the tightness of the rubber band and speed of rotation of the mechanism. The operating time from one start is 1 minute. The trigger lever is on the right.

The «MECHANICAL PICTURE» by "WOODEN.CITY" is a real find for those who appreciate beauty and love science.

Construction set features

Brand – Wooden city;

Packaging – a wooden box;

Material – environmentally friendly birch plywood, rubber bands;

It is started with a key;

There are two disks rotating with different speeds;

Rotates with help of a rubber motor;

The operating time from one start is 1 minute;

Tension of the rubber band is adjustable;

There is a trigger lever;

A special hook is attached to hang the picture on the wall;

Assembly does not require any glue;

Number of the parts – 245 on 5 sheets

Spare parts – 23

Assembly time – 8 hours.

Recommended for the children aged 14 years old.

 

Today, we represent "4x4", as an expensive off-the-road vehicle for brutal men. During the Second World War, the American company Willys started production of the Willys MB automobile. It went down in history as a reliable, manoeuvrable and functional vehicle. It was a "technical breakthrough". There was a real "war of engines". Overcoming of obstacles, road dust and risk! You have a real adventure in your hands!

4x4​ model has:

  - an internal combustion engine with moving pistons and a release lever at the rear of the car;

 - a ratchet mechanism;

 - a lever for switching the direction of travel;

 - three moving pedals (which are resiliently pressed with an additional rubber band);

 - at the rear of the model there is a trailing arm intended for the trailer;

 - four-wheel drive transmission, independent suspension on both axles;

 - removable shovel, axe and canister;

 - rear-view mirror;

 - drive of the model has joints and semi-axles with crossings like a real automobile.

The automobile model can drive up to 2 meters. After assembly, you need to set the position of the lever forward or backward, set the locking lever in the stop position, start the model with a key and lower the lever (the key is located in the spare wheel). The front wheels are steered. The hood is opened and fixed by two locks, and the windshield tilts.

"WOODEN.CITY" 3D puzzle is a construction set made of environmentally friendly materials with an open mechanism. The assembly does not require any glue. Press the parts and assemble in accordance with the instructions.

"WOODEN.CITY" 4x4 is a real find for those who are fond of history and like adventure.

Construction set features

Brand – Wooden city;

Packing – wooden box;

Material – environmentally friendly birch plywood, rubber bands;

Length of the path – 2 meters;

The model moves back and forth;

Independent suspension;

It is started with a special key;

The assembly does not require any glue;

Number of the parts – 520 on 9 sheets;

Assembly time – 12 hours.

Recommended for the children aged 14 years old.

 

Have you been to London earlier? You have a unique opportunity to plunge into the atmosphere of conservative London, creating a unique Double Decker.

It has a rubber motor, which may be easily started with a key.

LONDON BUS has two levels of speed and directions of movement.

Construction set features:

Model size L*B*H, mm - 232*70*115;

Packing size, mm - 355*240*40;

Brutto, kg - 1,090;

It is started with a special key;

Rotates with help of the rubber motor;

The length of the path from one started is 4 meters;

There are two control levers (speed and direction);

Assembly does not require any glue;

Number of the parts - 216;

Assembly time - 6 hours.

 

Would you like to construct your own airplane for less than 2 hours?

Try our Biplane. It has original rubber motor with a controlled acceleration.

 

 

 

Construction set features:

Model size L*B*H, mm - 161*140*88;

Packing size, mm - 240*175*28 ;

Brutto, kg - 0,310;

Rotates with help of the rubber motor;

The length of the path from one started is 0,5 meters;

Assembly does not require any glue;

Number of the parts - 63;

Assembly time - 2 hours.

 

Chariots were used for warfighting by a number of armies –Egyptian, Greek, Roman, Assyrian and Persian. The warriors felt themselves mobile shock flight, which blazed through everything alive on this unique vehicle.

They were always ahead or acted on the flank of the infantry. Such military lights destroyed the enemies in a moment, so that the following infantry just dealt the final blow to those, who managed to escape the chariot. The technique is rude, but efficient. In any case, power of the ancient army was judged by a number of used chariots.

CHARIOT DA VINCI

Da Vinci scythed chariot is a war chariot with scythe blades mounted on each side, employed in ancient times. The blades extended horizontally to each side of the wheels. Scythed chariot would plow through infantry lines cutting combatants in.

CHARIOT DA VINCI

 

CHARIOT DA VINCI

Rotates with help of the rubber motor;

ROMAN CHARIOT

Roman chariot is a war chariot employed and operated by Roman warriors in ancient times. This historically accurate Wooden City 3-D wooden puzzle with the rubber band engine was created just for you.

Set of three funny trinkets, which may be assembled together by yourself: Spinning Top and two different key chains.

To each parcel free of charge.

Packing size, mm - 106*59*17;

Assembly time - 30 min.

 

The WOODEN.CITY Team:

We are a small company consisting of creative people, fond of our business. Our team is not large, but friendly. We have a lot of new ideas, which we want to communicate to you!

Vlad, Anton and Nadezhda

Leonid and Yuri

We developed our first model at the end of 2015, and it became an inspiration for creation of our trademark WOODEN.CITY

Quality control

Our growing experience in development of new models has helped us to move forward with our ideas.

High-precision laser equipment

We have our own production with high-precision laser equipment.

Finished products

 

All we need now is your support!

Why do we need you support?

We are a small company in the EU (Poland).

With your support, we will be able to create and release new models.

We invite you to participate in this process.

Risks and challenges

We have small production facility, experience in delivery and international transportation.

We guarantee high quality of our products.

We have drawn up a well thought-out plan on further actions after completion of the project.

We choose the most convenient and reliable means of delivery.

Orders for our supporters will be sent from the EU.

Requiem for Greece is a cross-city ongoing LARP that started in February 2014. It is based on Vampire: The Requiem (Second Edition) by Onyxpath Publishing.

Right now, it numbers more than 70 players in three major cities in Greece: Athens, Thessaloniki and Heraklion and a Storytellers’ team of 10. Since we started we have played over a hundred local live sessions and 5 game-wide gatherings that we like to call Grand Elysiums.

It is a political horror game, taking place in an alternative and darker version of our world in the southern country of the Balkan peninsula, Greece.

 

 

Every half a year the players meet in one of the cities to play in a cross-city live session. This event is organized by the local team and takes place in one location. Players travel to meet the other members of this community and to portray their character in a large in-game gala.

The main goal of these events is to bring the people of Requiem for Greece closer and also to wrap up some main parts of the story.

From the character’s (in-game) perspective, the Grand Elysium, is a chance to maneuver the political scene of the dark creatures that are the focus of the story.

 

 

The 6th Grand Elysium takes place in Thessaloniki, Greece. It will last 2 days, 29-30 April 2017.

The location that has been chosen for the event is an old Jewish inn called Bensousan Han ("han" in Turkish language means motel or inn) from the Ottoman Era. More info about the building and its history you can find in the links at the end of the description.

Through this campaign we plan to fund the base costs of the event that include the Venue, the complementary drinks for every participant and the photographer.

It consists of two events. Each event will last for 6 hours every day, from sunset to the early hours of the next day.

 

 

Even though the base goal will give every participant a great LARP experience, we will be able to augment the event with some additions if we reach the following stretch goals.

With a stretch goal of 800 Euros the first day of the event will be filmed making it possible to have our first trailer about Requiem for Greece available online.

If the stretch goal of 1000 Euros is reached, the night will be filled with the sounds of a live chamber music band.

Further stretch goals will be announced in the future.

 

 

Players of the game already know how important these events are. They will get another chance to participate in a cross-city event that will change the story of the game forever.

Other funders will get the chance to leave reality behind for a few hours and be invited to a Gala, darker than it may seem, having the opportunity to interact with people that share their hobby How immersive this interaction is going to be depends on the perk you choose. More info about the perks can be found in each description respectively

 

 

Requiem for Greece is a team of LARP enthusiasts that focus on running a fun and immersive game. None of the members earns any income from this activity.

If money contribution is a complication for you, the event offers other opportunities for you to help.

For example, the event will be open for amateur photographers, musicians, and artists of any kind to show their work and enhance the experience for everyone else.

If you can think of any other way of helping, feel free to contacts us. Same goes in case you need more info about Requiem For Greece or Live action Role-playing generally.

Don’t forget to spread the word by using the Indiegogo sharing tools.

 

 

Requiem for Greece (Facebook)
Requiem for Greece (Website)
Bensousan Han (Facebook)

Contact info:
info@kindred.gr

story:
Orcus returns as the villain of Frog God Games' second Christmas adventure for 5e D&D, Pathfinder (1e) and Swords & Wizardry (OD&D)!

This high-level adventure plunges the players into the lowest depths of a mega-dungeon — the 34th level! This traditional dungeon crawl is anything but. Welcome to The Candy Crypt, where the foul demon Orcus’s Claws manufactures bittersweet treats and poisoned dreams. As the title suggests, this adventure can be placed at the bottom of any mega-dungeon, or it can be an isolated crypt hidden within the peaks of any frozen mountain chain. Inventory your gear and pack well: you are going to need it. 

The cold winds wash down from the north as the Northern Azure star shines over the village of Newville. The stars are right, as the constellation Gorgon Major rises in the east for the first time in a millennium. Sages scream in terror as they realize the time is nigh. Orcus’ Claws won’t be alone anymore; his beloved estranged wife, banished by the Forces of Law into a pocket dimension beyond the stars, is about to be released. It is the adventurers’ duty to thwart the summoning ritual — Claws must be stopped at all cost — he cannot summon his wife, Nohell Claws! 

Since this is a Christmas adventure, we're going to be sending out the PDF copies very shortly (almost immediately) after the Indiegogo closes. We're also planning to get the physical books in your hands by Christmas; but that comes with the strong caveat that in additional to the expected COVID delays at printers and shipping, holiday mail traffic traditionally causes its own delays. We've put February as the "committed delivery date," but if everything goes well we should deliver the physical books by December 25. The books we print will also, most likely, arrive before the PoD versions because there's a longer period of reviewing printer proofs on PoD than at a traditional printer.

The Project 

Frog God Games projects on Indiegogo are simple, focused, and short.

  • Short in duration (2-3 weeks)
  • Fast delivery of PDF once funding is completed
  • Limited to a single title
  • Have options priced between $5-$30
  • Stretch goals and project bonuses (if any) affect the principle reward only (usually both the PDF and the softcover).
  • Are the only guaranteed method to get the premium* print copy (NOTE: the softcover versions  in this printing will not be sold on our website: see FAQ for explanation).
  • Have a simple fulfillment process that does not use Backerkit

*Premium means heavyweight glossy interior pages enhancing the art and color elements. The  thick, glossy cardstock brings out the vibrant color of the cover illustration. These are the nicest softcover books we have ever sold and we only print a title this way once.

Any reprint would use print on demand service that, although nice, do not approach the quality of our INDIEGOGO funded books.

Why the Tiny Print Run?

Since 2012 our crowdfunding approach has been extravagant in every way. Ambitious with massive page counts, plus numerous add-on options and stretch goals. All supporting a primary title itself as many as 990 pages.

This has resulted in Kickstarter's with memorable pledge rewards that include top-quality hardcover books with sometimes dozens of stretch goal bonuses and add-on extras. These are awesome AND they are expensive to buy for customers like you because they are very expensive to make for publishers like us.

Why not use Kickstarter?

We will still be using Kickstarter, frequently, for our large-scale projects, but we hear the request for less expensive options for our products all the time, especially smaller, faster-paced adventures that can be completed in 2-3 sessions.

Product enhancements tied to project success 

During the funding period  and after the funding goal is met we will improve the delivered produased on additional sales. There are no special tiered collectors editions or add-on purchase extras. Thus, as total project funding increases, the better the final product will be for everybody.

Examples of improvements made to earlier products:

  • Additional commissions for interior color art specific to the adventure. 
  • The previous Indiegogo project added 2 interior art pieces and 3 extra creature illustrations for its appendix.
  • Downloadable Options designed for popular virtual table-top software (The rewards for both How Orcus Stole Christmas! and In Vino Gigantus included the new creature/NPC tokens and player maps). 
  • High-resolution files of illustrations to share with players at the table.

Project Delivery

PDF Perks

We will email the instructions to all eligible supporters with instructions on accessing PDF items. The PDF files are distributed using Constant Contact service and our web store. You will need to have a customer account on the [ Necromancer Games / Frog God Games ] website to get your PDF; it's how we keep track of everything and grants unlimited access by you to your reward.

The Indiegogo perk PDF files are 'purchased' at zero cost by supporters (as they are paid for during the Indiegogo promotion) at the [ Necromancer Games / Frog God Games ] web store using a coupon code. That code we will be sent via Constant Contact to the address provided by Indiegogo. Please contact us with any questions/requests about this.

Softcover Perks

Softcover perks will be mailed to the address provided by us via Indiegogo. 

 

Overseas Shipping

For the last several months, as those of you who follow us on Discord know, we have been grappling with the issue of high costs on shipping to locations outside the USA. We have decided that the most cost-effective way for our overseas customers to get books is by printing the books in print-on-demand format. This does not affect the USA, where we will continue ordinary printing and shipping.Â 

The print-on-demand books international customers will be receiving are high quality, but please be aware that they are different fromÂ the premium-quality books we are advertising for sale in the USA.

We have tremendous love and respect for our international customers, and this is the most workable way we have been able to find to keep you supplied with books with reliable delivery times at a reasonable price.

story:
The Air Deck -  The ultimate travel playing cards

By travelers for travelers: 

The idea for this project was conceived by fellow globetrotters Ursus and Rune while traveling South East Asia. We love playing cards, but we couldn’t really find anything that was quite suited for our minimalist way of traveling. When you travel as much as we do, you don’t want to carry anything extra around. Every item makes a difference. We’re big fans of improvement, and decided to create the ultimate playing cards for travelers. The making of the Air Deck has taken us through several countries, and we’ve met many wonderful people along the way. Now we have the prototype ready and we’re proud of the result. Meet our new travel companion, the Air Deck. The world's first truly travel optimized playing cards! 

Our mission is to create the ultimate playing cards for travelers.

 

The Air Deck is available in 3 colors:

Black

White

Red

Air Deck easily on small surfaces, such as a plane tray table.

Regular paper playing cards tear, stain, easily, but  Air Deck is extremely durable.

 

Quality

While we wanted a compact and light deck, we didn't want to compromise on quality. We went to several of the world’s manufacturers of premium casino cards and asked for the best materials they could provide. In the process of creating the ultimate travel deck, we tried out over 50 different high end plastic materials. The materials were taken through  scratch, bending and handling tests to identify the best candidate. Finally we ended up with a premium ‘casino quality’ PVC that has all the properties we want. 

The Air Deck takes up very little space and easily fits into your pocket.

The Air Deck is incredibly resistant to tearing and bending, and it’s totally waterproof. You can play with these in the pool, in the boat, in the tub, in the rain, at the beach, pretty much wherever you can think of.

The cards are 100% waterproof, so you can even use them in the pool or the bathtub.

The cards are washable. Liquids and dust rinse off easily.

The Air Deck is a surefire conversation starter.

 

Handling 

In the process of selecting the material we sought advice from several playing card professionals, to help us find the optimal material and design. The end result a deck that shuffles and handles like you expect professional cards to do. The cards are slightly textured on the back, while the front is plain. This provides excellent handling and a good grip. 

Our goal was to make the Air Deck both visually interesting and simple to read.

 

Design 

We’ve worked hard to create a fitting minimalist design for the Air Deck. For us, it was key that the cards are uncluttered, symmetrical and easy to read. We also wanted to create something fun and ‘out-of-the- ordinary’. The Air Deck’s unique design will no doubt act as a conversation starter on your travels. The deck consists of 52 playing cards + 2 jokers and measures 87mm X 32mm. Despite the smaller footprint we’ve retained all the features of standard decks. The length ensures that it handles much like a full size deck, and the narrower width makes the deck fit nicely in the palm of your hands. 

Jack, queen, king and ace of hearts.

The Air Deck in black color

The Air Deck in white color.

The Air Deck in red color

 

We hope that you are as excited about the Air Deck as we are. Support our project, and give yourself, or someone you care about, the perfect playing cards for traveling.

story:
Welcome to Wightwood Abbey on Indiegogo InDemand!

For those of you who missed our initial crowdfunding campaign, we are accepting late pledges through InDemand. Your pledge includes the original core set and all already unlocked stretch goals. 

Wightwood Abbey is a complete, 3D printable medieval abbey for use with tabletop games. The basic set includes a church, scriptorium, abbot’s house, stables, gatehouse and the enclosing walls. All of these unique pieces have been designed to work together as an overall abbey complex, or they could be used as standalone pieces in a variety of settings (steampunk, European theatre, etc).

In addition to the basic buildings, we unlocked a series of stretch goals in our last crowding campaign that add even more depth and playability to this already substantial product. For the duration of this InDemand promotion, those stretch goals have been added to the core reward, at no additional cost.

The rewards for this project will be delivered as .stl files for use with a home 3D printer or other 3D printing service.

Heroes defend the Wightwood Abbey church!

What do you get with your pledge?

Your pledge gets you download access to the digital .stl files for all the rewards at your pledge level. The core set for the Wightwood Abbey monastery consists of 5 buildings (the gatehouse, stables, scriptorium, abbot's house, and church), the encircling fortified walls, plus all previously unlocked stretch goals.

For those of you who want to see what the core set costs in your country's monetary denomination, you can get a live currency conversion here.

The core set pledge gets you everything listed below (over 70 models!), that's the core buildings plus all the unlocked stretch goals!

- 3 massive models perfect for large interior battles (scriptorium, church, infirmary) 
- 7 large buildings of multiple levels (abbot's house, rookery, shrine, gatehouse, etc) 
- 10 medium sized structures (crypt entrance, water pump, smitty yard, etc) 
- PLUS over 60 components! (everything from wood piles, to ladders, to an anvil)

 

The core set buildings details:

The Gatehouse

 

The Gatehouse:

"The ingress by which all those who follow the faith enter into the hallowed grounds of the abbey, and the means by which all those who would defile it are kept at bay. Be vigilant! Keep your eyes on the horizon!"

A two story building guarding the main entrance to the abbey. It has functioning double doors and is big enough for a horse and rider or small cart to pass through. The second story guard room is accessible by external stone stairs. The roof detaches to allow for internal gameplay. 

The Stables

The Stables:

"They say spending time with the innocence of animals is akin to spending time in the presence of the holy."

A one story building with two sets of functioning double doors. Large enough to hold animals or small vehicles. It comes with two small pens on either side with optional roofs. All roofs detach to allow internal game play. 

The Abbot's House

The Abbot's House:

"A place to rest your weary feet after long days of pacing the courtyard contemplating the nature of divinity. Rest well (and don't forget to say your prayers!)."

The personal residence of Wightwood Abbey's abbot. A two story building with internal detailing, a stairwell and functioning doors. Accessible on each floor by detachable levels and roofs.

The Scriptorium

The Massive Scriptorium:

"Ah, the glorious scriptorium, wherein all learning and copying of the ancient texts takes place. Hope you brought a cushion!"

A three story building which houses the monks quarters on the ground floor and the scripture hall in the upper gallery (where the monks copy out their holy texts). The third floor has an inner balcony level with access to a rear external balcony. The facade incorporates a cloister with detachable roof sections for easy access. The upper floors and roof come apart to allow multilevel access and game play. 

The Church

The Wightwood Church:

"So very much do the pilgrims revere the blessed church. Its majestic organ, sanctified nave, and magnificent apse bring humility to all who enter its sacred halls. May your devotion not go unnoticed."

A monumental building, printed in 10 parts, big enough for an internal battle. It has an interior balcony (with organ!) overlooking the nave, a tall tower and steeple, front and side entrances, as well as two small and one large rose windows. The roof and wall sections detach all the way down to the building's footprint to allow for easy access and sight-lines from all angles.

The Village Gate and fortified walls:

"Rest easy my brothers, for the walls were built over a hundred years ago, and never have they faltered. Well, there was that one time..."

Fortified stone walls topped by iron works surround the entire abbey complex to protect it from intruders. The main entrance is accessed through the guard house yet there is a second smaller 'village gate' entrance that gives the villagers access to the front doors of the church. 

The walls will hold but will the men!!

Each building comes in a bundle of clearly named .stl files that you can print on any 8"x 8" (200mm x 200mm) sized print bed. Some parts are meant to be glued together after printing and some left as separate pieces that attach via our simple peg system. 

 

The abbot's house as 3 printed parts, assembled and painted

Ease of Play - Each building has removable floors and rooftops and can be opened up to reveal a fully modeled playable interior. Buildings separate at just the right height for internal gaming to be obstruction free, and our peg system allows for easy separation and reattachment of sections. As well, passageways and floor areas have been modeled to accommodate standard 1” bases, so you’ve always got enough space to move your figures about. 

Game Scalability - Our .stl files are scaled to print at a 28mm tabletop standard (for ease of use with most roleplaying and tabletop miniature games) and are supplied as such. However, we have also made sure that models scaled to ½ size also print properly and can be incorporated into any 15mm historical wargame.

The abbot's house, scriptorium and gatehouse printed at 15mm scale (seen here with miniatures from Flames of War)

Historically Influenced/Visually Beautiful/Fun - Our vision of tabletop terrain is one of form as well as function. We want our gaming pieces to be able to fit equally into a historical setting as well as one of fantasy. For that reason, we’ve tried to keep true to examples of historical building methods and yet add enough of our own aesthetic to make them unique and full of character making them usable in both your fantasy and your historical games.

Printer Friendly -  Our models will print on any standard 8"x8" (200mm x 200mm) printer bed with minimal need for support material. We've carefully tested wall thickness, overhangs, potential bridging issues and other 3D printing pitfalls and have incorporated the most efficient way to print each part (given the variation of printers out there) into our final .stl files. 

Functional Doors - All of the doorways in Wightwood Abbey feature fully open-able doors with no obstructions. We've developed our own system for hinged doors, windows, etc, and we're exited to make it part of this product. Watch the video below to see how they work.

 

Lore and Campaign Ideas - Also included in the all core set and higher pledges is access to our .pdf files of Wightwood Abbey lore, characters and campaign Ideas to add to your own existing campaign or get you started on a new one.

As well, we have teamed up with Michael Prescott (Trilemma Adventures) who will be publishing one of his mini-adventures based on the Wightwood Abbey lore, and also providing some illustrations for the .pdf. 

If you're not familiar with Michael's work, I strongly urge you to check out his Patreon. If you love quality art paired with totally unique adventure writing then he's someone you would do well to consider sponsoring. 

Pictured below is an image from one of his Trilema Adventures, similar in style to how we hope to portray the inner workings of the various abbey buildings.

A ¾ cutaway drawing by Michael Prescott from his Trilemma Adventures

 

Examples of Interior Modelling

Part of the reason for us running the initial crowdfunding campaign was to raise enough money to finish modelling the interior of the core set buildings. Here are some examples of progress made on that modelling:

The Abbot's House w/ Interior Modelling:

 

The Gatehouse with Interior Modelling:

 

Preliminary tile work on the scriptorium floor:

 

Many stretch goals were unlocked during our initial campaign and are listed in the "what you get" image near the top of this page. All the unlocked goals are part of your InDemand Perk and will be delivered as they are completed. Below you will see some of the stretch goal concept art. 

Infinite Dimensions Games, Ltd., was started by James Binnie and Dawa Fruitman for the purpose of creating high quality, realistic scenery for download and 3D printing. Between the two of us, there is over 20 years of experience in professional 3D modelling and 50 (!) years of time spent playing tabletop games. We saw a need in the gaming community for a line of detailed terrain with a high degree of in-game functionality and realism, and all our efforts are directed to meet that need. Our models are designed with the gamer in mind and are play-tested for ease of use and durability. We want to see beautiful, realistic 3D printed terrain on the table and we want to be the ones creating it. It is our most sincere hope that these models exceed your expectations and bring excitement and maybe more than a little pride when you use them in your games.

TERMS AND CONDITIONS. Your pledge gets you download access to the .stl files for all the rewards at your pledge level. This kickstarter is NOT for physical product, and access to a 3D printer (either your own or through a printing service) is needed to take advantage of the rewards. These digital files and the models you print with them are for PERSONAL USE ONLY. You may not sell models you print using our files, nor may you distribute the digital files or use any derivatives for commercial purposes. If you would like to sell printed versions of our models please contact us about an artisan or printer's licence.

 

Wightwood Abbey in the media

And in review

Check out Wightwood Abbey being demoed at Breakout Con in Toronto in this brief video showing the setup at our vendors' table.

 
We went live on April 8th to answer some questions about the campaign. Check our the video on youtube here:
 

 

We went live again on April 17th to talk about the stretch goals that were unlocked and describe a little more what we have in store for those:

 

Risks and challenges

We’ve been working on this project for many months now and have the core set nearly finished. Risks associated with completion of this project are minimal as we have a very clear path laid out to put the finishing touches on the core product. Our funding goals have already been met through our Kickstarter campaign and we have accounted very well for our costs. As well, as there is no physical product, there is no risks involved in manufacturing or shipping. All we have to do is sit down and complete the tasks we’ve already started.

We have interior texturing and an exterior wall to finish, stretch goals to model, and then the final versions of .stl files to compile. The risk would be that we would be unable to complete what is left. However, years of experience budgeting for 3D projects has helped us pick our initial funding goal and our stretch goals wisely and we know we will be able to deliver the products promised as we have already attained the funding we were seeking.

Both of us have owned and operated our own businesses for many years and although this is a new business we are very familiar with the demands of running a business and of having to deliver on-schedule. 

Because this work is our passion and we want to move forward in creating a vibrant, thriving business, you can be sure we are 100% dedicated to making this project a complete and thrilling success.

story:
On almost on every page [of this book] you will find something to inspire you or a plot seed. If you want to run a Sword and Sorcery game you could do far worse than using this, even when you ignore all the Savage Worlds specific stuff.”

- Chaosmeister – Chaotic/GM Blog

 

“Beasts & Barbarians is not only an excellent Savage Worlds setting, but a great depiction of sword and sorcery compared to any system. With Savage Worlds’ inherent modularity, it’s easy to add in heroic mechanics alongside gritty mechanics without breaking the system. Creating characters akin to pulp and heroic fantasy is so easy that very little changes from the core rulebook. But beware: this isn’t epic fantasy and magic is dangerous.”

- Aaron Huss – roleplayerschronicle.com

A Sword and Sorcery Savage Worlds setting

Welcome to the Dread Sea Dominions!

Imagine a land, far away in space and time, dominated in the past by a cruel race of sorcerer-priests, the Keronians. Cursed by the gods, their empire was wiped out by a cataclysm, the fall of the Dread Star, which has thrown the world into barbarism and created the Dread Sea Dominions from the scattered ruins of the past.

It is a world of savage barbarians who venture into ancient ruins to save scantily-clad damsels from a fate worse than death under the claws of pre-human beastmen.

It is a world of chainmail bikini amazons fighting in the sun-scorched arenas of Faberterra to appease the crowds of the decadent cities of the Iron Empire.

It is a world where dark sorcerers invoke the forbidden names of demons in temples old before mankind took its first, hesitant, steps outside the caverns of the north.

This is the world of Beasts & Barbarians where everything is built to evoke the feel of the pulp fantasy stories of the ’30s!

Because Steel is Stronger than Gold!

This project will fund the third edition of Beasts & Barbarians, the Sword and Sorcery setting for Savage Worlds. After the first, seminal, Player Guide, the fans and players demanded a more complete game, the Golden Edition, which served us well for five years.

Since then, many things have happened in the Dominions, both in the official sourcebooks and published scenarios, and in the awesome stories you’ve told with your friends around the gaming table, and we decided to extend the timeline by the same amount of time, giving us the chance to introduce new events, sinister plots, events and characters.


We’ve hammered down this new edition in steel, the holiest of metals:  it now includes an extended timeline, new lore, an expanded setting, gear, adventures, monsters and much more - and we streamlined the rules as well.

Oh, and all of this is in full color.

But only you, wise reader, can decide if this blade will be forged or not!

Beasts & Barbarians Steel Edition is composed of two books, the Player's Guide and the Game Master Guide.

The Player's Guide includes:

  • Summarized descriptions of the lands and the history of the Dominions
  • Accurate descriptions of the various playable cultures, including clothing, religion, technology and so on.
  • More than 40 new Hindrances and Edges to create sword and sorcery heroes.
  • Specific gear (from loincloths to Amazon Hawk Ships)
  • Three custom-made arcane backgrounds and their specific trappings: sorcery, Lotusmastery and enlightenment.
  • Setting rules including After the Adventure events, crafting rules, expanded mass battle rules
  • And much more!

The Game Master Guide includes:

  • A detailed history of the Dominions, expanded and focused on the last five years.
  • A gazetteer of the Dominions, including old and new plot hooks for each region, and the new Dominion Events.
  • A chapter focused on themes, tricks and narrative techniques to make your games even more Swordy and Sorcerish.
  • Rules and tips to create Character Tales (adventures focused on a single player character).
  • A fully-fledged character generator.
  • An expanded Bestiary, including Personalities of the Dominions, the movers and shakers of the setting.
  • An introductory  One Sheet adventure.

If funded, you will also get an introductory adventure "The Soul in the Water", so you can jump into the Dominions in no time!

Both books will be hardcover, 144 pages. Adventure will be in booklet format (black and white).  Covers for both books have final art, but layout may change. 

You can check early layout draft here! (it may change in the end, especially art, justyfing and colors). 

Every order will get either pdf of print version of A print of handpainted map of the Dominions crafted by talented artist  and mistress cartographer Francesca Baerald.

MAP PREVIEW

(Map will be in poster A3 format, which is 11.7'' × 16.5'', folded) 

About shipping. 

  • Poland $6
  •  European Union $15
  • USA and Canada $20
  • Rest of the world $25

 

Thanks to your efforts, barbarians and amazons, we are funded! At this level we’ll produce the two core books of Beasts & Barbarians Steel Edition, the Player’s Guide and the Game Master’s Guide, plus Soul in the Water, a full- length adventure in a separate booklet, and a ton of extra goodies: custom-made Tokens (Tokens include: Advancement tokens, Dungeon Advancement tokens, Exterior Advancement tokens, Hollow Tokens (token with  hole inside, made to mark things on character sheet), Bennies, Steel Bennies, Golden Bennies, Aim, Defend, Wound, Shaken, Loot tokens and Lotus tokens.), cards, a pouch  with dice set (6 black dice + special Wild Die with a B&B symbol on it) and a gorgeous A3 map of the Dominions!

At this level, we’ll produce a collection of ten player characters, the Heroes of the Dominions, each of them with a detailed backstory, personalized Plot Hooks and customized in-game Rewards!

We’ll also make four bookmarks (pdf and printed) to use in your old, forbidden tomes.

At this level, the acclaimed John Goff (Deadlands’ Night Train, "Fear Agent™ RPG" and a number of other cool things) will write a Beasts & Barbarians One Sheet.

At this level the talented guy Ed Wetterman of the 12 To Midnight team (ETU) will write a One Sheet for Beasts & Barbarians!

What about hunting Trolls? In this long adventure by Umberto Pignatelli you can do it! You will have it both in pdf and printed booklet format.

A this level the 12 to Midnight Preston DuBose will design and write a second One Sheet in the Dominions! Are you ready for it?

Another long adventure by Umberto Pignatelli will be published unlocking this stretch goal! We challenge you to face the lure of Enyia… whoever she is! This will be available both in pdf and printed booklet format.

At this level we’ll collect and print all the unlocked One Sheets and adventures as a book! What can I tell you know that it will be black and white softcover book with Ania great art. Not enough? This will have Soul in the Water, Troll hunt, Enya song, 4 one sheets backed, and more! Yes, more - you will also get One Sheet Arrow’s Run from Umberto! Will your heroes run faster than an arrow to save their lives from slavers? Still not enough? Umberto will also write an untitled yet adventure for this book (format like The Justice of Kerir Shar). 

Of course, that book is for free! 

 

Addons are available for everybody who chooses any printed product. As indiegogo has a problem with addons, please simply overpay for your reward tier, noting what you pay for.

Map $1

A print of handpainted map of the Dominions crafted by talented artist  and mistress cartographer Francesca Baerald. (Map will be in poster A3 format, which is 11.7'' × 16.5'', folded) 

Dice set + bag $10

A set of seven dice (six black and Wild Die white), made explicitly for Beasts & Barbarians, Wild Die has a special holy symbol which will made all your rolls lucky (no, they aren't weighted, we swear).

Deck of cards  $15

A deck of special poker cards with pics of Beasts & Barbarians.

Cardboard bennies (28 Bennies) $10

A full set of Beasts & Barbarians Bennies, including the new Golden and Steel Bennies! (picture show only one side of those bennies)

Cardboard tokens full set (110 tokens)  $25

A set of 110 tokens to track the most common conditions in a Beasts & Barbarians game. Tokens include: Advancement tokens, Dungeon Advancement tokens, Exterior, Hollow Tokens (token with  hole inside, made to mark things on character sheet), Bennies, Steel Bennies, Golden Bennies, Aim, Defend, Wound, Shaken, Loot tokens and Lotus tokens.

Adventurers! Core $17

A copy of the Core rules of Adventurers , an RPG in few pages.

Adventurers! Set $33

Both Adventurers  books - Core and Fantasy.

Wolsung  $25

A copy the Steam Pulp Fantasy rpg of cinematic action set in the daring times  of the Magical-Industrial Revolution. This is  not Savage Worlds (but it's awesome!!! and ENnie-nominated)

Beasts & Barbarians  Heroes and Villains $20

A set of  48 cardboards minis depicting the main he roes (amazons, barbarians, rogues,  sorcerers, monks etc...) and villains of the setting!

Beasts and Barbarians Steel Edition and all other things! will be published/produced in cooperation with GRAmel/Fajne RPG, a Polish company known for Beasts and Barbarians Golden Edition, Adventurers!, Wolsung, Nemezis, and Polish editions of Savage Worlds and Deadlands. We are on market for more than 10 years and we have published almost 100 books or pdfs. We have also published a lot of board games and we are  behind  Boardgames 4 U. We have access to all sorts of tabletop game accessories, and a long experience in international tabletop game market.

 Fajne RPGs have had 3 successful crowdfunding campaigns in Poland (Beszamel, Szare Szeregi and Beasts and Barbarians+Adventurers!), and delivered all rewards; their Beasts of the Dominions and Adventurers! crowdfunding has also been delivered successfully.

We gather money mostly for print and, first of all, for new, great art for you. If campaing is succesful, we will order art from our artists and then do final layout and send pdfs, then print books and other things. 

Answering your quesions: We will try to answer at least once a day. During weekends, it may be a bit longer between our answers. I hope that you will understand.

Art preparation may take some time, but we expect all pictures will be ready for September, so we can send things out in late 2017 or, as December is hell for post offices, early 2018.

On almost on every page [of this book] you will find something to inspire you or a plot seed. If you want to run a Sword and Sorcery game you could do far worse than using this, even when you ignore all the Savage Worlds specific stuff.”
- Chaosmeister – Chaotic/GM Blog
 
“Beasts & Barbarians is not only an excellent Savage Worlds setting, but a great depiction of sword and sorcery compared to any system. With Savage Worlds’ inherent modularity, it’s easy to add in heroic mechanics alongside gritty mechanics without breaking the system. Creating characters akin to pulp and heroic fantasy is so easy that very little changes from the core rulebook. But beware: this isn’t epic fantasy and magic is dangerous.”
- Aaron Huss – roleplayerschronicle.com


A Sword and Sorcery Savage Worlds setting
Welcome to the Dread Sea Dominions!
Imagine a land, far away in space and time, dominated in the past by a cruel race of sorcerer-priests, the Keronians. Cursed by the gods, their empire was wiped out by a cataclysm, the fall of the Dread Star, which has thrown the world into barbarism and created the Dread Sea Dominions from the scattered ruins of the past.
It is a world of savage barbarians who venture into ancient ruins to save scantily-clad damsels from a fate worse than death under the claws of pre-human beastmen.
It is a world of chainmail bikini amazons fighting in the sun-scorched arenas of Faberterra to appease the crowds of the decadent cities of the Iron Empire.
It is a world where dark sorcerers invoke the forbidden names of demons in temples old before mankind took its first, hesitant, steps outside the caverns of the north.
This is the world of Beasts & Barbarians where everything is built to evoke the feel of the pulp fantasy stories of the ’30s!
Because Steel is Stronger than Gold!
This project will fund the third edition of Beasts & Barbarians, the Sword and Sorcery setting for Savage Worlds. After the first, seminal, Player Guide, the fans and players demanded a more complete game, the Golden Edition, which served us well for five years.
Since then, many things have happened in the Dominions, both in the official sourcebooks and published scenarios, and in the awesome stories you’ve told with your friends around the gaming table, and we decided to extend the timeline by the same amount of time, giving us the chance to introduce new events, sinister plots, events and characters.
We’ve hammered down this new edition in steel, the holiest of metals:  it now includes an extended timeline, new lore, an expanded setting, gear, adventures, monsters and much more - and we streamlined the rules as well.
Oh, and all of this is in full color.
But only you, wise reader, can decide if this blade will be forged or not!

Beasts & Barbarians Steel Edition is composed of two books, the Player's Guide and the Game Master Guide.

The Player's Guide includes:

Summarized descriptions of the lands and the history of the Dominions
Accurate descriptions of the various playable cultures, including clothing, religion, technology and so on.
More than 40 new Hindrances and Edges to create sword and sorcery heroes.
Specific gear (from loincloths to Amazon Hawk Ships)
Three custom-made arcane backgrounds and their specific trappings: sorcery, Lotusmastery and enlightenment.
Setting rules including After the Adventure events, crafting rules, expanded mass battle rules
And much more!


The Game Master Guide includes:

A detailed history of the Dominions, expanded and focused on the last five years.
A gazetteer of the Dominions, including old and new plot hooks for each region, and the new Dominion Events.
A chapter focused on themes, tricks and narrative techniques to make your games even more Swordy and Sorcerish.
Rules and tips to create Character Tales (adventures focused on a single player character).
A fully-fledged character generator.
An expanded Bestiary, including Personalities of the Dominions, the movers and shakers of the setting.
An introductory  One Sheet adventure.

If funded, you will also get an introductory adventure "The Soul in the Water", so you can jump into the Dominions in no time!
Both books will be hardcover, 144 pages. Adventure will be in booklet format (black and white).  Covers for both books have final art, but layout may change. 
You can check early layout draft here! (it may change in the end, especially art, justyfing and colors). 
Every order will get either pdf of print version of A print of handpainted map of the Dominions crafted by talented artist  and mistress cartographer Francesca Baerald.
MAP PREVIEW
(Map will be in poster A3 format, which is 11.7'' × 16.5'', folded) 
About shipping. 

Poland $6
 European Union $15
USA and Canada $20
Rest of the world $25


 



Thanks to your efforts, barbarians and amazons, we are funded! At this level we’ll produce the two core books of Beasts & Barbarians Steel Edition, the Player’s Guide and the Game Master’s Guide, plus Soul in the Water, a full- length adventure in a separate booklet, and a ton of extra goodies: custom-made Tokens (Tokens include: Advancement tokens, Dungeon Advancement tokens, Exterior Advancement tokens, Hollow Tokens (token with  hole inside, made to mark things on character sheet), Bennies, Steel Bennies, Golden Bennies, Aim, Defend, Wound, Shaken, Loot tokens and Lotus tokens.), cards, a pouch  with dice set (6 black dice + special Wild Die with a B&B symbol on it) and a gorgeous A3 map of the Dominions!

At this level, we’ll produce a collection of ten player characters, the Heroes of the Dominions, each of them with a detailed backstory, personalized Plot Hooks and customized in-game Rewards!
We’ll also make four bookmarks (pdf and printed) to use in your old, forbidden tomes.

At this level, the acclaimed John Goff (Deadlands’ Night Train, "Fear Agent™ RPG" and a number of other cool things) will write a Beasts & Barbarians One Sheet.

At this level the talented guy Ed Wetterman of the 12 To Midnight team (ETU) will write a One Sheet for Beasts & Barbarians!

What about hunting Trolls? In this long adventure by Umberto Pignatelli you can do it! You will have it both in pdf and printed booklet format.

A this level the 12 to Midnight Preston DuBose will design and write a second One Sheet in the Dominions! Are you ready for it?

Another long adventure by Umberto Pignatelli will be published unlocking this stretch goal! We challenge you to face the lure of Enyia… whoever she is! This will be available both in pdf and printed booklet format.

At this level we’ll collect and print all the unlocked One Sheets and adventures as a book! What can I tell you know that it will be black and white softcover book with Ania great art. Not enough? This will have Soul in the Water, Troll hunt, Enya song, 4 one sheets backed, and more! Yes, more - you will also get One Sheet Arrow’s Run from Umberto! Will your heroes run faster than an arrow to save their lives from slavers? Still not enough? Umberto will also write an untitled yet adventure for this book (format like The Justice of Kerir Shar). 
Of course, that book is for free! 
 


Addons are available for everybody who chooses any printed product. As indiegogo has a problem with addons, please simply overpay for your reward tier, noting what you pay for.
Map $1

A print of handpainted map of the Dominions crafted by talented artist  and mistress cartographer Francesca Baerald. (Map will be in poster A3 format, which is 11.7'' × 16.5'', folded) 
Dice set + bag $10

A set of seven dice (six black and Wild Die white), made explicitly for Beasts & Barbarians, Wild Die has a special holy symbol which will made all your rolls lucky (no, they aren't weighted, we swear).
Deck of cards  $15

A deck of special poker cards with pics of Beasts & Barbarians.
Cardboard bennies (28 Bennies) $10

A full set of Beasts & Barbarians Bennies, including the new Golden and Steel Bennies! (picture show only one side of those bennies)
Cardboard tokens full set (110 tokens)  $25

A set of 110 tokens to track the most common conditions in a Beasts & Barbarians game. Tokens include: Advancement tokens, Dungeon Advancement tokens, Exterior, Hollow Tokens (token with  hole inside, made to mark things on character sheet), Bennies, Steel Bennies, Golden Bennies, Aim, Defend, Wound, Shaken, Loot tokens and Lotus tokens.
Adventurers! Core $17

A copy of the Core rules of Adventurers , an RPG in few pages.
Adventurers! Set $33

Both Adventurers  books - Core and Fantasy.
Wolsung  $25

A copy the Steam Pulp Fantasy rpg of cinematic action set in the daring times  of the Magical-Industrial Revolution. This is  not Savage Worlds (but it's awesome!!! and ENnie-nominated)
Beasts & Barbarians  Heroes and Villains $20

A set of  48 cardboards minis depicting the main he roes (amazons, barbarians, rogues,  sorcerers, monks etc...) and villains of the setting!


Beasts and Barbarians Steel Edition and all other things! will be published/produced in cooperation with GRAmel/Fajne RPG, a Polish company known for Beasts and Barbarians Golden Edition, Adventurers!, Wolsung, Nemezis, and Polish editions of Savage Worlds and Deadlands. We are on market for more than 10 years and we have published almost 100 books or pdfs. We have also published a lot of board games and we are  behind  Boardgames 4 U. We have access to all sorts of tabletop game accessories, and a long experience in international tabletop game market.
 Fajne RPGs have had 3 successful crowdfunding campaigns in Poland (Beszamel, Szare Szeregi and Beasts and Barbarians+Adventurers!), and delivered all rewards; their Beasts of the Dominions and Adventurers! crowdfunding has also been delivered successfully.
We gather money mostly for print and, first of all, for new, great art for you. If campaing is succesful, we will order art from our artists and then do final layout and send pdfs, then print books and other things. 
Answering your quesions: We will try to answer at least once a day. During weekends, it may be a bit longer between our answers. I hope that you will understand.
Art preparation may take some time, but we expect all pictures will be ready for September, so we can send things out in late 2017 or, as December is hell for post offices, early 2018.

story:
Dark Days Tarot: A Mirror and Tool in Times of Strife or Celebration

UPDATED SHIPPING DATE: Decks are now due to ship to backers by the end of June, 2017!

The Dark Days Tarot decks and Guidebook was created and illustrated by Wren McMurdo. This Indiegogo campaign is for the purpose of collecting pre-orders for (some of the first) and second shipment of decks. 

Tarot was first introduced in Italy in the 15th century, as a deck of playing cards with meaningful imagery, and has been used all across the globe as a tool for mirroring and creating destiny. The cards in a Tarot deck tell stories about life and it's milestones, challenges, and celebrations, and guide users to more deeply understand themselves and their life path. This Tarot deck is designed from an intersectional feminist point of view.

The Dark Days Tarot deck is so named in honor of the dark days of the lunar cycle, respected as level with full moon days. The dark days of the lunar cycle are often marked by introspection, reflection and meditation--equally as important as the wild and exciting full moon days. They can offer a gaze into that which may be hidden, and be a call to action in periods of confusion or distress.

Use of these cards is made easier with the included flip-able guidebook. Please use the guidebook as a prompt, only if needed. Use all Tarot reading materials with a grain of salt. It is your interpretaion, not a booklet's that matters. (Please note this flipbook is streamlined for easy travel readings. If readers feel any trepidation in first learning Tarot, additional tarot/oracle card reference materials can be very helpful in getting the hang.)

The cards and booklet are packaged in a beautiful heirloom-grade box with a pull-away lid. 

Decks pre-ordered through this campaign are due to ship by the end of June,  2017.

Should you need a refund at any point before the ship date, please email wren@darkdaystarot.com, and your request will be granted. If you receive your deck and it is not as wonderful as you expected, simply email wren@darkdaystarot.com for return shipping instructions and a full refund will be granted upon receipt of a return shipping tracking number.

story:
Tabletop games have always been a crucial part of “living the dream”, and we stand out among the competitors by offering more laughs-per-minute than has previously been available to the general public. That’s right, with the government crumbling above us, there’s no one to stop us from exporting military-grade hilarity to your very own home.

Doing Cristal would get you a one-way ticket to the hoosegow and a three-part lecture from Nancy Reagan, but if you knew to drink it, you’d be that much closer to flipping off your coworkers as your game-piece crosses the finish line. Are you smart enough to smoke Henry Clay? To drink Black Bush? To eat Spotted Dick? Find out with these (and two-hundred and ninety-six other) questions after a simple click and pledge.

Unlike other big-box, long-playing trivia games, Eat It, Drink It, Smoke It, Do It! can be set up in six seconds, and if you know the title, you already know how to play! You can be playing EDSD like a champ the very moment you receive your copy, before the deliveryman has time to realize you’ve handcuffed him to the radiator—you and your new hostage can begin to answer the hundreds of hilarious questions. There are only four possible answers, but that’s still more choice than you had in the last election. Fun, easy, affordable, gut-busting entertainment all in one box? How American is that? Very American. We checked.

Get in on this rising star before it’s too late. You don’t want to have to explain to your grandkids that you sat idly by when Eat It, Drink It, Smoke It, Do It! needed you most. Not again. Help out the starving artists behind this game and check “Made a Difference” off your bucket list.

Box Contents;

One playing board

One Die

32 Award Cards

300 Playing Cards

8 Pawns

Instruction card
