story:
Shardhunters - The Card Game was originally funded on Kickstarter, and after the campaign's conclusion we decided to bring it to Indiegogo too, via the InDemand service. You can buy Shardhunters - The Card Game here, it is already a successfully funded product, with a planned shipping in August 2019.

 

 

Game Rules


Learn the super easy rules within a few minutes and master the tactics while you play. Fight hordes of undead Monsters, collect Bloodshards, recruit the right Heroes and make powerful skill combos! Be cunning and try to outsmart your friends with unexpected moves. But don’t ever forget, you are not the only strategist in the party!
 


 

Gameplay

 


Here’s how we keep the gameplay flowing:
 

  • All actions happen simultaneously so you'll never have to wait for the other players.
  • There's no handicap for new players, the game is easy to learn and because 7 Monster cards are always out of the game, players can't tell what's in their opponents' hands by memorizing the cards that were previously played in a Hunt.
  • There's no stealing in this game. In Shardhunters as soon as you have a Monster, a Hero or a Bloodshard it is yours alone and nobody can take it from you.
  • We're keeping it simple so you can enjoy the game and the time with your friends. With only 2 active Heroes allowed per player, you don't have to remember a thousand things at once. What matters for you is your cards plus a handful of Hero abilities that can also alter other players' gameplay (e.g. reducing the value of all yellow cards in play) 
  • You can't drop out of the game, everyone will be in play until somebody wins.
  • Monster cards are completely language independent.

 

Rulebook


Download the English Rulebook for a deeper understanding of the game's rules or to see alternate ways to play, etc. Please note that it is still subject to change.
 

OFFICIAL RULEBOOKS (ENG & HUN):


FAN-MADE TRANSLATIONS:

 

 

 

 

 


Shardhunters - The Card Game is set in the dark fantasy universe of Unseen Domains.

It is the middle of the 17th century. Magic has awakened and the world is overrun by hordes of the undead revived by the Witchplague. Entire nations have disappeared, and their people are scattered all over the continent.

With the magical veil broken between worlds, creatures that were previously known only in legends have crawled out of their lairs. It’s become clear that things once thought to be nothing more than myth and superstition have in fact always existed, people just lacked the magical sense needed to see them.

In this new era nothing is more valued than the magical Bloodshards, which only grow in a few places swarmed by these supernatural creatures. These mysterious crystals were first discovered by the people of the Canton, who rediscovered ancient sacrificial rituals that cracked the Alps open and opened up a path to refuge from the undead hordes.

Finding it strange that the sacrificial blood disappeared in the ground without leaving a trace, they conducted a series of rituals to reveal where the blood was going. It turned out that all the human blood spilled was sucked away by some strange crystals buried deep within the the mountains, which glowed in a hellish red colour.

Bloodshards crave human blood. When there's bloodshed around them they absorb every single drop of it and grow into a stunning crystal shape in the process. They have extremely strong magical powers, some of which remain unknown to the world. It is clear though that combining them with the ancient runes of the Canton will give anyone power over dead matter, be it the rocks of a mountain or an entire army of mechanical soldiers.

Since then Bloodshards have been smuggled out of the Canton and are now scattered in a few hidden places, where they grow relentlessly in this world of unstoppable carnage. As many crave the power of the shards, adventurers gather from far and wide to fight for this almost unattainable treasure. They are called the Shardhunters.
 


Heroes play a very important role in Shardhunters - The Card Game. With a carefully selected team, you can get lots of Bloodshards and win the game quickly. You’ll be able to choose from 20 different Shardhunters (Heroes). Pair them up, and form various possible combos. We’ll leave it up to you to find the perfect combinations, so let’s just take a look at them and their backgrounds in general to see who will accompany you on your journey into the grim world of the Unseen Domains universe.

The Witchplague took many lives on the seas, where entire fleets disappeared and flourishing trade routes ceased to exist. Oceans and seas did not escape the curse either. While huge, mythical beasts dominate the world underwater, frigates swarming with the undead float aimlessly on the surface. Only the most desperate of pirates and merchants (yellow cards) dare to try their luck on the cursed waters. Selena, Morgan, Hector and Triton are the Shardhunters who aid them, gaining lots of Bloodshards from this alliance. So long as Clemence, the Manhunter doesn't enter the scene.  After all,  pirate skulls can still fetch a fortune...

Repelling the ever growing hordes of monsters gets harder all the time. There are, however, a few Shardhunters who are at their most lethal when facing masses of enemies. Alicia, Constantine, Ulrich, Anna and Luther will all gain Bloodshards in the 3rd Combat if you use their abilities well.

Some wield battleaxes, others may carry rifles and there are a few who summon up magical powers to counter the swarming hordes of the undead, obliterating the foul creatures with a cool mind and never ending patience. If during the Hunt you don’t want to care about anything but wreaking the most tactical destruction, then select Heroes who gain their Bloodshards at the end of the Hunt, based on the loot they secured. Nimrod, Angelo and Benedictus are your best choices.

Beside the undead many other unspeakable creatures roam the wilderness, from huge werebears to tiny white rats. Varden and Shena are your best choices if you want to form alliances with these mythical beasts.

The Heroes all gather in Stambul to share their stories of adventures and prepare for their next Hunt. As the rumours go around about the might of our team, and the fortune they make selling the almost priceless Bloodshards they acquired, more and more aspiring Heroes will want to join us. There are, however, two peculiar fellows in the Tavern. One is always surrounded by a crowd, while the other always sits in a dark corner all alone. Although she lacks any kind of martial skills, Natasha, the Seducer, is welcome on any team because of her beauty and her various other talents… While no one would accompany the lone wolf Crow on a Hunt… and he doesn’t want them to either. He is more than capable of completing his quests on his own, staying true to his nickname: the Deathbringer.


 

We're an international team, mostly based in Hungary, Europe. Shardhunters - The Card Game is part of the Unseen Domains dark fantasy universe that we're building in all genres, platforms and basically everywhere possible. We have released an anthology book and a comic book and we're also working on a digital card game. Check out our other works too, if you like the mood of this game:  www.lycanstudio.com

They are called the Shardhunters. Heroes play a very important role in Shardhunters - The Card Game. With a carefully selected team, you can get lots of Bloodshards and win the game quickly. You’ll be able to choose from 20 different Shardhunters (Heroes). Pair them up, and form various possible combos. We’ll leave it up to you to find the perfect combinations, so let’s just take a look at them and their backgrounds in general to see who will accompany you on your journey into the grim world of the Unseen Domains universe.The Witchplague took many lives on the seas, where entire fleets disappeared and flourishing trade routes ceased to exist. Oceans and seas did not escape the curse either. While huge, mythical beasts dominate the world underwater, frigates swarming with the undead float aimlessly on the surface. Only the most desperate of pirates and merchants (yellow cards) dare to try their luck on the cursed waters. Selena, Morgan, Hector and Triton are the Shardhunters who aid them, gaining lots of Bloodshards from this alliance. So long as Clemence, the Manhunter doesn't enter the scene.  After all,  pirate skulls can still fetch a fortune...Repelling the ever growing hordes of monsters gets harder all the time. There are, however, a few Shardhunters who are at their most lethal when facing masses of enemies. Alicia, Constantine, Ulrich, Anna and Luther will all gain Bloodshards in the 3rd Combat if you use their abilities well.Some wield battleaxes, others may carry rifles and there are a few who summon up magical powers to counter the swarming hordes of the undead, obliterating the foul creatures with a cool mind and never ending patience. If during the Hunt you don’t want to care about anything but wreaking the most tactical destruction, then select Heroes who gain their Bloodshards at the end of the Hunt, based on the loot they secured. Nimrod, Angelo and Benedictus are your best choices.Beside the undead many other unspeakable creatures roam the wilderness, from huge werebears to tiny white rats. Varden and Shena are your best choices if you want to form alliances with these mythical beasts.The Heroes all gather in Stambul to share their stories of adventures and prepare for their next Hunt. As the rumours go around about the might of our team, and the fortune they make selling the almost priceless Bloodshards they acquired, more and more aspiring Heroes will want to join us. There are, however, two peculiar fellows in the Tavern. One is always surrounded by a crowd, while the other always sits in a dark corner all alone. Although she lacks any kind of martial skills, Natasha, the Seducer, is welcome on any team because of her beauty and her various other talents… While no one would accompany the lone wolf Crow on a Hunt… and he doesn’t want them to either. He is more than capable of completing his quests on his own, staying true to his nickname: the Deathbringer. We're an international team, mostly based in Hungary, Europe. Shardhunters - The Card Game is part of the Unseen Domains dark fantasy universe that we're building in all genres, platforms and basically everywhere possible. We have released an anthology book and a comic book and we're also working on a digital card game. Check out our other works too, if you like the mood of this game:  www.lycanstudio.com

story:
MASSIF DISPLAYS

 

There are currently 5 types of Massif Display Sets available:

  • Small Set -- 8 small stands
  • Medium Set -- 2 medium stands
  • Large Set -- 1 large stand
  • Mixed Set -- 4 small stands and 1 medium stand
  • Card Set -- 2 stands being developed as a post-funding reward! Check out our recent update for more info!

 

Use Massif Display stands to decorate shelves with your favorite board games and card tuck boxes.

 

 

 

 

 

Displays in use at Borderlands Games in Salem, Oregon. 

 

 

Use Massif Displays to decorate your game room for your weekly game night and/or special events.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Use Massif Displays to highlight fun games to the patrons of your board game cafe.

 

 

  

MASSIF DISPLAYS...

  • are lightweight yet durable.   ✔
  • have a compact and minimalist style.   ✔
  • fold completely flat.   ✔
  • fit into most game boxes.   ✔
  • have an unobtrusive, clean look.   ✔
  • feature space for price tags.   ✔
  • allow for custom stickers/graphics/decorations.   ✔
  • are extremely easy to travel with.   ✔
  • easily go through airport security.   ✔
  • are made with board game materials.   ✔ 
  • hold all sizes of board games.   ✔

  

  

As a board game publisher, I was frustrated with the lack of good tools for displaying the games I make at conferences. I decided to design displays that are specifically tailored to meet the needs of the board game industry.

 

Just a few sets of Massif Display stands can make a noticeable difference to your publisher stand at a conference.

   

   

Massif Displays are perfect for:

  • Game Publishers   ✔
  • Game Designers   ✔
  • Gaming Cons and Events   ✔
  • Game Testing Groups   ✔
  • Board Game Cafes   ✔
  • FLGS (Friendly Local Game Store)   ✔
  • Game Reviewers   ✔
  • Game Collectors   ✔
  • Anyone wanting to show off their games   ✔
  • Book Stores   ✔
  • Book Authors   ✔
  • Libraries   ✔
  • Craft Makers   ✔
  • Artists   ✔
  • Business Travelers   ✔

   

    

    

   

 

Stretch goals have been unlocked, and all stands will now have a nice LINEN FINISH! 

   

   

What People Are Saying... 

"These displays are far better than any of the display stands I have ever purchased for my games, comics, & baseball plaques." -Christopher Richter, Reviewer, Blogger at Board Gaming For The Win

"PERFECT for conventions and retailers. This seems like an obvious need for many reasons." -Gamerati Curated Kickstarter Page

"I think the stands have a great presentation quality and can really showcase the games well." -Steph Hodge, Game Reviewer, Photographer, Blogger of "All the Meeples of the Rainbow"    

"We are definitely going to back your campaign." -Cody Miller, Game Designer and Founder of Far Off Games  

"These are great, very cool, I'd want some personally and for our biz [business] for convention display." -Anthony Melia, founder of Only Table Top

"Looks really nice! Would love to have a few sets." -Desnet Amane, producer at Moaideas Game Design  

"If these had existed when I bought my current book stands, I would have bought them instead." -Tom Gondolfi, Author and Publisher at Tanstaafl Press

"I really like the way they look." -Clinton Morris, Gamer and Blogger at The Morris Standard

  

    

Display Details...

Watch this video to learn more about the different stand sizes, or scroll down to read more. 

  

   

Small displays work with:  

  • Small tabletop games   ✔
  • Playing cards   ✔
  • Card games   ✔
  • Game components   ✔
  • Business cards   ✔
  • Small decorative tins   ✔
  • Small books   ✔
  • Small dictionaries   ✔
  • Greeting cards   ✔
  • Small souvenirs   ✔
  • Post cards   ✔
  • Jewelry   ✔

Here are some random things I own on SMALL Massif Displays. I like using the small stands for showing components and cards from games that I'm making.

    

Medium displays work with:

  • Tabletop games (all sizes)   ✔
  • Card games   ✔
  • Video games   ✔
  • Books (all sizes)   ✔
  • DVD's and VHS   ✔
  • CD's   ✔
  • Puzzles   ✔
  • Classic records   ✔
  • Wood art and crafts   ✔
  • Decorative tins   ✔
  • Jewelry   ✔
  • Artwork and pictures   ✔

Here are some random things I own on MEDIUM Massif Displays. I use medium displays the most, especially when I'm attending game conferences and conventions. 

They are also great for attending local small game cons and displaying what you brought to play. Or admiring the artwork as you play. ;)

   

   

Large displays work with:

  • Extra heavy items (10+ pounds / 5+ kilograms)   ✔
  • Tabletop games (large and big box games)   ✔
  • Wood art and crafts   ✔
  • Large pictures   ✔
  • Large puzzles   ✔
  • Dictionaries and encyclopedias   ✔
  • Magazines   ✔
  • Records   ✔
  • Artwork and pictures   ✔

Here are some random things I own on LARGE Massif Displays. I really like using these for displaying big box and monopoly-sized games. And they are great for extra heavy items like pictures and large books.

   

   

PERK LEVELS

You can order up to 10 of any combination of Massif Display Sets by selecting the corresponding perk level. All perk levels include FREE WORLD-WIDE SHIPPING!

For example, if you would like 1 Small Set, 2 Medium Sets, and 1 Large Set, you should choose the "4 Sets of Massif Displays" perk level for $23. (This would get you 8 small stands, 4 medium stands, and 1 large stand.) Make sure you specify which types of sets you would like included. 

   

    

If you would like more than 10 sets, please email sales@massifgames.com and we will help you out! 

    

Massif Display Perk Packages

In addition to the perks available here on Indiegogo, we have also put together a list of packages, tailored for your specific needs. If you would like to purchase a display package (free shipping included), click the link on the corresponding package to purchase on our website using our secure payment processor. 

Traveling Author - $16

This package is great for authors, comic writers, speakers, and really anyone who travels and needs to easily display a few books, documents, and business cards while at a speaking engagement or convention. 

This package includes 4 small stands and 3 medium stands with FREE world-wide shipping. (2 sets total)

Enough displays to show books, flyers, and business cards while staying lightweight for travel.

Shipping is not available for Brazil and Russia.

Game Designer - $20

This package is perfect for game designers showing their games to play-testers and publishers. Just enough displays to help any game literally stand out and get noticed. 

This package includes 8 small stands, 2 medium stands, and 1 large stand, with FREE world-wide shipping. (3 sets total)

Shipping is not available for Brazil and Russia.

Small Game Publisher - $26

Are you a publisher with a small booth at GenCon or Spiel '17? Hoping your newest game on a small table will get noticed by thousands of glazed-eyed gamers walking by? 

This package is what you need to get your game seen. It will give you more table space, work with any size board game, and position your game at an easy viewing angle for people walking by!

This package includes 8 small stands, 6 medium stands, and 1 large stand with FREE world-wide shipping. (5 sets total)

Shipping is not available for Brazil and Russia.

Large Game Publisher - $32

If you are a publisher with a few more tables and games to display, this is the package for you. You'll have enough stands to layout several games, show off new and old inventory, and most importantly, keep everything looking attractive and professional. 

This package includes 12 small game stands, 7 medium game stands, and 2 large game stands with FREE world-wide shipping. (7 sets total)

Shipping is not available for Brazil and Russia.

Game Café / Meetup Group - $39

This is a great package for game cafes, or even weekly game meetup groups. This package provides the right amount and type of displays you need to decorate your space, show off the newest game additions, and mark/reserve tables for certain games. 

This package includes 4 small stands, 11 medium stands, and 3 large stands with FREE world-wide shipping. (9 sets total)

Shipping is not available for Brazil and Russia.

Game Store / Book Store - $45

As a game/book store owner, you want your product to be easily seen by customers. You want them to pick up that game or book, and never put it down. You want to display your weekly open box game in a way that generates attention. And you want to take advantage of any available space you have. This package is the one for you! 

This package includes 8 small stands, 12 medium stands, and 4 large stands with FREE world-wide shipping. (11 sets total)

Want additional sets for selling to your customers, and keeping your branding top of mind? Consider moving to the Custom Level below.

Shipping is not available for Brazil and Russia.

Custom Level / Retailer Level - $50 or more

If you are looking for more than 10 sets of displays, or you're a retailer looking for wholesale pricing, you are in the right place!

Message us by email at sales@massifgames.com for a quote. 

Retailer pricing is only available to those with verifiable business locations.

   

   

CUSTOM GRAPHICS AVAILABLE!

For orders of 500 sets or more, we can offer custom printed graphics. Put your graphics, name, or logo on the displays, and give/sell them to customers to keep your business top of mind. We also offer options to license our designs for use with your own manufactured game products. 

   

  

 

FULFILLMENT AND SHIPPING

We have arranged for a trusted and well-known fulfillment company to ship the displays to you after a successful campaign. This will help you get your Massif Displays faster, and allows us to offer USA, Canadian, EU, and Australian friendly shipping.

    

FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING  

By using a fulfillment company and specifically designing these displays to fit into envelopes, we are proud to be able to offer world-wide shipping included in the cost of your pledge.  

Whether you are in the USA, Greece, South Africa, or Pakistan, you can purchase a Massif Display for your showing needs. We are like Amazon Prime, but world-wide! ;)

   

   

TIMELINES... 

We feel confident offering a 3-4 month estimated timeline from funding completion to a Massif Display in your hands. At the very minimum, we intend to ship your displays before GENCON in August. 

In fact, you can even arrange to pick up your displays from the Massif Games booth at GenCon 50 in Indianapolis, Indiana. We will also be at Internationale Spieltage '17 in Essen, Germany!

While many campaigns take an upward of 6 months to fulfill, here are the reasons we anticipate our campaign delivering faster than normal:  

  • Our product has a very simple design. This means less risk of supply chain issues and manufacturing difficulties. 
  • Manufacturing is ready to go (see next section). 
  • We are using an excellent fulfillment company in the same continent as our manufacture. This means we don't have to load the displays onto ships across the Pacific. 
  • Several of our team members live in Europe and can easily be on hand at our manufacturing and fulfillment companies, should something come up.

 

   

   

Manufacturing is READY TO GO!

We have an excellent manufacturing plant in Netherlands lined up and ready to produce Massif Displays. In fact, they've already made and shipped us several test displays, so that we don't have any unpleasant surprises when we do a full production run.

   

     
   
          

The Story Behind Massif Displays

   

   

Big statement. But a quick google search, and you'll see that finding displays designed for board games is hard. Even Amazon has nothing.

Yes, you can find book stands. But no, book stands don't work with board games. Know why?

Board games are unique. Each game has a different size, weight, and shape. Unless you have the perfect size game, your book stand won't work.

I own an indie board game publishing company, Massif Games. I had a booth at SPIEL'16 in Essen, Germany to show my game, The Mountaineer.

While there, I was frustrated trying to display games at the correct angle on the table. Completely flat, and only people at the table can see the box artwork. Completely vertical, and people at the table have to crane their necks to see it. 

While we made a make-shift cardboard stand to lean the games against, it didn't work well. The games were constantly sliding off, and I even caught one instance of this on camera (see the main video at the top of this page)!

 

When I got back to the USA, I started looking for something that would work, as I had other events at which I wanted to show my games. But I couldn't find anything, even on the almighty Board Game Geek website. 

I started asking around, and my suspicions were confirmed. Other board game publishers, designers, reviewers, and even just players and collectors had the same problem. No good way to show off their games! 

That was it for me. I started to design and develop Massif Displays.

   

   

MASSIF GAMES - A BENEFIT CORPORATION

Massif Games is a legally registered Benefit Corporation in the State of Oregon. In fact, we are currently the ONLY board game publishing company in the USA with this designation. 

Being a Benefit-Corporation means that we are committing to being an environmentally and socially responsible business. This is something that I'm passionate and very excited about. 

Our business is dedicated to giving away time and money for wilderness preservation and fighting human trafficking. In our corporate articles, we have specific goals including: 

  • 1. Massif Freedom
  • 2. Massif Good
  • 3. Massif Visibility
  • 4. Massif Benefits

You can read more about what we do as a Benefit Corporation here.

   

     
     
  

Meet the Project Creator - Corey Wright

Hi, I'm Corey. I'm passionate about using creativity and business to help make the world a better place. I love designing and creating new things to solve problems. Here's a few items of interest from my background.

  • Full-time owner/manager of Massif Games since 2015.
  • Created several board and card games
  • Do technical writing and design work on the side
  • Previous years of experience in technology development and scale up for a pharmaceutical company (Sarepta Therapeutics). 
  • Degree in Chemistry with Pre-Medical and Advanced Chemistry options
  • Physical and organic chemistry research experience
  • LOVE mountaineering and hiking. 
  • Big music fan. Play the cello, drums, and guitar. 
  • Love volunteering and promoting social justice. 

Feel free to message me, meet me for coffee, or ask any random question that hits your brain.

   

  

Special Thanks To...

Special thanks to the following additional people for helping prepare this project, assisting with reviews, translations, and more: 

  • Alejandro Butler 
  • Andrew Pitt 
  • Anthony Melia 
  • Archive Coffee and Bar 
  • Bénédicte Billard 
  • Berina Tuttle 
  • Bez Shahriari 
  • Borderlands Games 
  • Camille Jones 
  • Chris Wright 
  • Game Knight Lounge 
  • Heather Wright 
  • Jacob Nuttbrock 
  • Jeong-Bin Kim 
  • Jordan Magnuson 
  • Joseph Z Chen 
  • Joshua Geimer 
  • Kajsa Skarsgård 
  • Kevin Gatimu 
  • Kim Brebach 
  • Marcel Groenewoud 
  • Martin Precek 
  • Mostafa Depo 
  • Pako Medina 
  • Roel Eerhart 
  • Steph Hodge 

   

   

RISK MITIGATION!

We've been working very hard to make sure this campaign will be a success, and that you will receive your rewards as soon as possible. That said, things can always go wrong. 

Here is a quick video that discusses a few low probability risks with this campaign.

  

  
   
    

Risks and challenges

Product testing is complete. The manufacturing company is ready. The fulfillment company is ready. We've gone over our budget a million times, and performed as much risk mitigation as possible. The biggest challenge is funding!

WITHOUT YOUR PLEDGE, we can't make Massif Displays! Massif Games is a small company, and we are just getting started. We don't have the capital to manufacture these stands, without your help.

PLEASE! Pledge $1 or more, and help us finally give the game industry the display stands it needs!

  

  

Additional Links

    

   

Want to purchase sets or packages on our website?

  • Click here for À la carte  
  • Click here for Traveling Author  
  • Click here for Game Designer  
  • Click here for Small Game Publisher  
  • Click here for Large Game Publisher  
  • Click here for Game Café  
  • Click here for Game Store  
  • Click here to send an email requesting a custom quote or for more information.

Are you a retailer? Contact us at sales@massifgames.com, and we can generate a custom quote to meet your business needs!

We will also be at Internationale Spieltage '17 in Essen, Germany!While many campaigns take an upward of 6 months to fulfill, here are the reasons we anticipate our campaign delivering faster than normal:  
Our product has a very simple design. This means less risk of supply chain issues and manufacturing difficulties. 
Manufacturing is ready to go (see next section). 
We are using an excellent fulfillment company in the same continent as our manufacture. This means we don't have to load the displays onto ships across the Pacific. 
Several of our team members live in Europe and can easily be on hand at our manufacturing and fulfillment companies, should something come up.
       Manufacturing is READY TO GO!We have an excellent manufacturing plant in Netherlands lined up and ready to produce Massif Displays. In fact, they've already made and shipped us several test displays, so that we don't have any unpleasant surprises when we do a full production run.                     The Story Behind Massif Displays      Big statement. But a quick google search, and you'll see that finding displays designed for board games is hard. Even Amazon has nothing.Yes, you can find book stands. But no, book stands don't work with board games. Know why?Board games are unique. Each game has a different size, weight, and shape. Unless you have the perfect size game, your book stand won't work.I own an indie board game publishing company, Massif Games. I had a booth at SPIEL'16 in Essen, Germany to show my game, The Mountaineer.While there, I was frustrated trying to display games at the correct angle on the table. Completely flat, and only people at the table can see the box artwork. Completely vertical, and people at the table have to crane their necks to see it. While we made a make-shift cardboard stand to lean the games against, it didn't work well. The games were constantly sliding off, and I even caught one instance of this on camera (see the main video at the top of this page)! When I got back to the USA, I started looking for something that would work, as I had other events at which I wanted to show my games. But I couldn't find anything, even on the almighty Board Game Geek website. I started asking around, and my suspicions were confirmed. Other board game publishers, designers, reviewers, and even just players and collectors had the same problem. No good way to show off their games! That was it for me. I started to design and develop Massif Displays.      MASSIF GAMES - A BENEFIT CORPORATIONMassif Games is a legally registered Benefit Corporation in the State of Oregon. In fact, we are currently the ONLY board game publishing company in the USA with this designation. Being a Benefit-Corporation means that we are committing to being an environmentally and socially responsible business. This is something that I'm passionate and very excited about. Our business is dedicated to giving away time and money for wilderness preservation and fighting human trafficking. In our corporate articles, we have specific goals including: 
1. Massif Freedom
2. Massif Good
3. Massif Visibility
4. Massif Benefits
You can read more about what we do as a Benefit Corporation here.               Meet the Project Creator - Corey WrightHi, I'm Corey. I'm passionate about using creativity and business to help make the world a better place. I love designing and creating new things to solve problems. Here's a few items of interest from my background.
Full-time owner/manager of Massif Games since 2015.
Created several board and card games
Do technical writing and design work on the side
Previous years of experience in technology development and scale up for a pharmaceutical company (Sarepta Therapeutics). 
Degree in Chemistry with Pre-Medical and Advanced Chemistry options
Physical and organic chemistry research experience
LOVE mountaineering and hiking. 
Big music fan. Play the cello, drums, and guitar. 
Love volunteering and promoting social justice. 
Feel free to message me, meet me for coffee, or ask any random question that hits your brain.     Special Thanks To...Special thanks to the following additional people for helping prepare this project, assisting with reviews, translations, and more: 
Alejandro Butler 
Andrew Pitt 
Anthony Melia 
Archive Coffee and Bar 
Bénédicte Billard 
Berina Tuttle 
Bez Shahriari 
Borderlands Games 
Camille Jones 
Chris Wright 
Game Knight Lounge 
Heather Wright 
Jacob Nuttbrock 
Jeong-Bin Kim 
Jordan Magnuson 
Joseph Z Chen 
Joshua Geimer 
Kajsa Skarsgård 
Kevin Gatimu 
Kim Brebach 
Marcel Groenewoud 
Martin Precek 
Mostafa Depo 
Pako Medina 
Roel Eerhart 
Steph Hodge 
      RISK MITIGATION!We've been working very hard to make sure this campaign will be a success, and that you will receive your rewards as soon as possible. That said, things can always go wrong. Here is a quick video that discusses a few low probability risks with this campaign.           Risks and challengesProduct testing is complete. The manufacturing company is ready. The fulfillment company is ready. We've gone over our budget a million times, and performed as much risk mitigation as possible. The biggest challenge is funding!WITHOUT YOUR PLEDGE, we can't make Massif Displays! Massif Games is a small company, and we are just getting started. We don't have the capital to manufacture these stands, without your help.PLEASE! Pledge $1 or more, and help us finally give the game industry the display stands it needs!    Additional Links       Want to purchase sets or packages on our website?

Click here for À la carte  

Click here for Traveling Author  

Click here for Game Designer  

Click here for Small Game Publisher  

Click here for Large Game Publisher  

Click here for Game Café  

Click here for Game Store  
Click here to send an email requesting a custom quote or for more information.
Are you a retailer? Contact us at sales@massifgames.com, and we can generate a custom quote to meet your business needs!

story:
In Children of the Fall, the players play as the sole survivors of an apocalypse that has turned all the adults on the planet into evil, bloodthirsty savages known as the fallen. As a group, the players will explore and develop the world and story together in a completely collaborative system. Players will need to keep an eye on the ever shifting hierarchy of their tribe, build and grow their haven and do the jobs that need doing to ensure the tribe’s survival. Agency is shared amongst the players, and the game uses a brand new streamlined and simple rule set, which keeps all the players engaged in every scene.

Children of the Fall is designed for 3-5 players. It is a GMless story game. Sessions take 120-240 minutes to complete. Unlike many traditional story games, Children of the Fall has support for one shot and campaign styles of play.

By backing the campaign on Indiegogo you will be the first to get your hands on the game (a full month before anyone else). This is also the only place to get the deluxe hardcover version with the unique cover artwork - be a part of history and proudly boast that you are one of the few who can proudly claim ownership of this special edition of the game.

The game is complete - so as soon as the campaign is over you will get your PDF copies with the printed version following shortly afterwards.

The game supplements unlocked as stretch goals will only ever be available here. We will not release these PDF's anywhere else - this is the only chance to get them!

Children of the Fall comes in a glorious 6x9 hardcover or softcover (as well as a digital edition). The game features a thematic and gritty layout as well as incredible artwork from Vincent Sammy and The Forge Studios.

This campaign is the only place where you will be able to get the limited edition hardcover version of the book with the "clean" version of the cover artwork. It is a dramatic and beautiful book which will look great on any bookshelf.

Our previous IGG Campaign not only delivered all rewards and stretch goals on time, but actually early (which is very rare for crowdfunding campaigns). We are confident we can do the same with this campaign!

The game has been lavishly illustrated by acclaimed South African graphic designer and illustrator VINCENT SAMMY. He has created 8 amazing pieces for the game, each of which features in a full page spread in the book. The artwork is visceral, unique and dramatic - just like the game. We are very proud of it.

 

We have deliberately set a modest funding goal so we can get into the stretch goal territory as soon as possible! Please make sure you share the campaign on your social media platforms so that we can fund some of these exciting stretch goals.

UNLOCKED: HD WALLPAPER PACK

$1000:  TUTORIAL VIDEO

$2500: BONUS PLAYBOOK: The Devil (only available through this campaign)

$3500: BONUS MISSION: ESCORT (only available through this campaign)

$6000: PRINT QUALITY BOOST: All paper and printing quality will be upgraded to PREMIUM - making this book look as beautiful as possible.

After our extremely successful campaign for KARMA last year, we are confident we can again deliver a quality product on time. The book has already been written and laid out. We will be using DriveThruRPG for all our fulfilment as this minimises risk and lowers cost (by allowing us to ship directly from the printer to your door).

We have used DriveThruRPG for all our RPG publishing needs up to this point and have been extremely satisfied with their service. It is because of this that we are confident in their abilities to fulfill this project.

After the campaign ends, you will all receive your digital copies of the game within 48 hours (so you can start playing and enjoying straight away)! The physical rewards will be shipped out as soon as possible (once we have received and approved the print copy).

The stretch goals may also be delivered a little bit later, but they won't impact on the due date of the base game - getting Children of the Fall to you as soon as possible is our number one priority. 

We appreciate it a hell of a lot (more than you know) when you share the campaign on social media. Spreading the word is how we can get this game funded! We appreciate it so much that we want to reward you for doing it, so we are launching Referral Rewards!

Firstly, you need to be a backer of Children of the Fall and signed in to your Indiegogo account (this is so we have your email address to send you your rewards). Then all you need to do is share the campaign using the social media buttons on the campaign page.

If you get 5 people to back the campaign through your links, then you will be gifted the entire Frenzy Kitty Games back catalog on DriveThruRPG.

So log in, share and earn those delicious rewards! Thank you for helping us to make this campaign a success!

Thank you so much for visiting (can hoepfully backing) this campaign. This campaign can't succeed without your help! Please consider sharing it with your friends and on social media. The more backers we get, the more stretch goals we unlock and the better the game will be for everyone.

Thank you for all your support! We are extremely proud of Children of the Fall and look forward to bringing it to you soon!

story:
THE VISION

Hello, I'm Christian Haven.  Like many of you, I always wanted to do something creative that people would enjoy.  Then one night I had a dream about a Christmas game to celebrate the birth of Christ.  When I woke up, the basics were laid out fresh in my mind:  the game was a journey where the wise men would follow the guiding star, they would get the three gifts of gold, frankincense and myrrh, and there would be obstacles in their journey to overcome.

Can you envision your family gathered around the table laughing and playing together focused on the birth of Christ in the spirit of Christmas?

 

 

THE GAME

The game is a challenging journey to see which of the wise men can be the first to reach the baby Jesus in Bethlehem.  There is the excitement of camels to ride and wild stallions to capture, and the dangers of sand storms and robber bands to overcome, and the intrigue of spies with secret codes, and the elation of finally arriving at Bethlehem.  So gather round with family and friends, laugh and play, and bring the spirit of Christ into your Christmas.

Stella Nova is three types of games rolled into one for children and adults: 

       1. a fun racing game, 

       2. a resource strategy game, and 

       3. an educational trivia game.

 

 

1. The basic game is a Contest to see which of the wise men can be the first to reach the baby Jesus in Bethlehem.  Even young children can play.  The magi traverse the caravan trails on the game board, which is a huge 20"x 30" map of the Middle East with authentic names from that ancient time period.  But before arriving at Bethlehem, the magi must collect the three gifts of:

  • gold, frankincense and myrrh.  

Also they will need provisions and supplies for the long journey: 

  • stores of food and water to cross the deserts,
  • tents to protect against the sand storms,
  • compasses to guide them when the clouds obscure the guiding star,
  • weapons to fight off the bands of robbers, and
  • secret codes to get by the spies of King Herod.

 

2. For youth and adults, Stella Nova is also a Strategy Game that tests their wits. The equipment can only be obtained at certain city bazaars along the caravan trails.  So players must:

  • determine the most efficient caravan trail from the East to Jerusalem-- remember you have to pick up the three gifts;
  • decide how many days supply you need between cities-- you can only go so far without food and water; and
  • decide what resources and equipment to take and what to leave behind-- the camels can only carry so much.

3. And in addition, Stella Nova is a Bible Trivia Game.  To obtain the three gifts and the needed equipment, adult players must answer questions.  The question cards are divided into two groups:

  • History and Geography, and 
  • Biblical Scripture.

An answer sheet is provided to check the responses.  In addition the Bible question cards have citations of chapter and verse.

 

TESTIMONIALS

"This game brings the Christmas story of the wise men to life.  I played it with my nieces and nephews; even the young kids really got into it!  They loved figuring out their own strategy to get to Bethlehem." - Lea, Fairfax, Virginia

"I love this game, we all had fun. We definitely have a new Christmas tradition here."  - Cheryl, Reading, Pennsylvania 

"A lot of people get a new family game for Christmas each year, and I have happened upon a really great one... Stella Nova.  The kids have begged to play every day since we got it.  One of my favorite things about Stella Nova is the absolute solid construction. The board and game pieces are not flimsy... the box is sturdy enough to last many Christmases.  Stella Nova will definitely be a game we look forward to pulling out each Christmas." - Katy Dill, mommy blogger, nobigdill.com

"Friends, check out this new game. Our family played it, and loved it.  Serious players who like Monopoly would like it; an easier-play version is included for younger players.  My 8 year old and 11 year old grandchildren loved it, and my 16, 18 and 20 year olds loved it too. Great gift for Christmas."  - Michelle, Cincinnati, Ohio

"We played Stella Nova. Thanks for a very fun experience!  Our guest gaming expert liked it and rated it 8.5 out of 10, and he is difficult to please."  - Marcia, Salt Lake City, Utah 

"Stella Nova is lots of fun to play.  I thought it was kind of like Monopoly, yet not, because there is a destination and you will arrive.  You just need some time to get there.  I also thought it’s a little like Trivial Pursuit because you must answer questions to receive things that you need for your journey.  Can hardly wait to play again."  - Janet, Canton, Ohio

"Such a perfect game. I’m always looking for really fun activities that help me and my family think about Christ, not just for Christmas, but on Sunday. This is exactly what I was looking for." - Julia, Riverside, California

 

THE QUALITY

All the game components are in beautiful, full color, even the tokens, and all are of top-quality construction-- built to last.  The box is 60 pt chipboard, which is 50% thicker than the standard 40 pt, and the playing cards are 12 pt instead of 10 pt.  Inside the box is a custom-made platform divider to organize the numerous playing pieces.  This quality is important because I want your game to last year after year and foster a family Christmas tradition.

And although it is much more expensive, we are proud that the game is made in America to help the local economy and provide work for our neighbors; so we put the American flag on the box.

 

THE GAME CONTENTS

1  Game board map 20x30 inches, folds into a 10-inch square

24  Supply cards

18  Equipment cards

18  Gift cards

16  Wild stallion cards

50  Bible scripture cards

50  Geography and history cards

2  Answer sheets

6  Camel-rider playing tokens

1  Black, six-sided die

1  Rules instruction booklet

1  Platform divider to organize game pieces

 

 

EDUCATIONAL

Stella Nova is geographically and historically accurate for the Biblical time of Christ.  So it makes a fun teaching aid for church schools and home schoolers.

For instance, why are the magi on the box top wearing golden yellow robes? This was a status symbol that only the wealthy could afford. The color comes from dying the robes in saffron, which is a very expensive spice even today. 

The game board map is an accurate depiction of the Middle East at the time of Christ, even down to the ancient names of the cities. For example, Yathrib in Arabia is called Medina today. The town was renamed by the Muslim prophet Muhammad in 622 AD. The ancient gold mines were located in Kush. In the Middle Ages this region was called Nubia, but today it is called Sudan.  The two great centers of learning, Alexandria and Antioch, are also on the map. They along with Rome comprised the three largest cities in the Roman Empire. 

In science, the term “stella nova” was first used by the great astronomer Tycho Brahe.  In his book “De Nova Stella” of 1573, he disproved the Aristotelian belief in an unchanging heaven. His measurements showed that new stars, “stellae novae,” lacked the expected parallax. Today in modern astronomy, a “stella nova” is called a “super nova.” 

Answers to Biblical questions have citations by chapter and verse. The answers have been checked and conform with the King James version (KJV), the New Living Translation (NLT), the New Revised Standard version (NRSV), and the New American Bible (NAB).

 

THE REWARDS

There will be games coming available for Indiegogo backers by Thanksgiving.  So we can promise that the first 1,000 games will be delivered to our backers by Christmas.

$39  "The Child" - One Stella Nova game with Free Shipping in the US

$72  "The Loving Couple" - Two Stella Nova games with Free Shipping in the US

$99  "The Three Wise Men" - Three Stella Nova games to you wise men and women with Free Shipping in the US, Plus three "gold seal winner" stickers to attach to the games

$159  "The Star" - Five Stella Nova games to you Stars with Free Shipping in the US, Plus five "gold seal winner" stickers to attach to the games

$299  "The Shepherds"  - Ten Stella Nova games to you Shepherds and Pastors with Free Shipping in the US, Plus 10 "gold seal winner" stickers to attach to the games, Plus a Free DVD of the acclaimed movie "The Nativity Story" 

$650  "The Host of Angels" - 10 autographed Stella Nova games to you Angels with Free Shipping in the US, Plus 10 matching Stella Novas, Plus "gold seal winner" stickers to attach to the games, Plus a free DVD of the acclaimed movie "The Nativity Story," Plus dinner with the game creator in 2019 (if you are within a 2-hour drive, otherwise a gift certificate to a restaurant.)

 

STRETCH REWARDS

$15,000 -  Every Indiegogo backer will receive a "gold seal winner" sticker that can be placed on the game box.

$25,000 -  Every Indiegogo backer will receive an exclusive "premier" sticker that can be placed on the game board, proving that you are an original Stella Nova backer.  And the Star, Shepherd and Angel backers will be acknowledged by name on the Stella Nova website.

 

THE CREATORS

 

Hello, I'm Dallen Haven, the younger part of a father and son team.  Christian created the basic design of the Stella Nova game.  Then I formulated the rules, and improved them based on the recommendations of the play-testers.  We're very grateful to all of them for the many hours they spent.   Christian then worked with the outside contractors to make the vision a reality.  Pictured below is the original "game board" sent to the first play-testers.

We are so pleased to have our hand-drawn sketches converted into works of beauty by the artistic talent of our illustrator and graphics designer, Michael Spahitz, of BoardGameDesigns.com in Nevada.

And we are grateful for the production expertise of our manufacturer, EPI DeLano Services of Michigan.  They are one of only three companies in all of America that could produce the game for us.

 

 

THE FUNDING

The funds of $5,000 will be used for production, and for publicity, promotion and marketing, so that more people like you can celebrate the birth of Christ in a fun and joyous way at Christmas.  We plan to expend the funds for Internet advertising with Google, Facebook and Amazon., We hope to reach the second stretch goal, so we have funds for more games and greater exposure by advertising with Christian and Catholic periodicals and talk radio.  If we reach the third stretch goal, we plan to produce more games and market them at the Christian Products show in Atlanta and the Catholic Marketing show in Chicago. 

 

THE RISKS

There are risks in every business venture; we have experienced marketing risks with slow growth from using word of mouth.  Now with your campaign pledges we hope to realize the vision of providing a fun way for many families and friends to celebrate the birth of Jesus at Christmastime.

In our case, you will not face the design and production risks in receiving your perks.  Stella Nova is already designed and the games will be available for you the backers before the campaign is over.  However, you still face the acceptance risks of a game that may not achieve the anticipated wide-spread acclaim.

Thanks for a very fun experience!  Our guest gaming expert liked it and rated it 8.5 out of 10, and he is difficult to please."  - Marcia, Salt Lake City, Utah "Stella Nova is lots of fun to play.  I thought it was kind of like Monopoly, yet not, because there is a destination and you will arrive.  You just need some time to get there.  I also thought it’s a little like Trivial Pursuit because you must answer questions to receive things that you need for your journey.  Can hardly wait to play again."  - Janet, Canton, Ohio"Such a perfect game. I’m always looking for really fun activities that help me and my family think about Christ, not just for Christmas, but on Sunday. This is exactly what I was looking for." - Julia, Riverside, California THE QUALITYAll the game components are in beautiful, full color, even the tokens, and all are of top-quality construction-- built to last.  The box is 60 pt chipboard, which is 50% thicker than the standard 40 pt, and the playing cards are 12 pt instead of 10 pt.  Inside the box is a custom-made platform divider to organize the numerous playing pieces.  This quality is important because I want your game to last year after year and foster a family Christmas tradition.And although it is much more expensive, we are proud that the game is made in America to help the local economy and provide work for our neighbors; so we put the American flag on the box. THE GAME CONTENTS1  Game board map 20x30 inches, folds into a 10-inch square24  Supply cards18  Equipment cards18  Gift cards16  Wild stallion cards50  Bible scripture cards50  Geography and history cards2  Answer sheets6  Camel-rider playing tokens1  Black, six-sided die1  Rules instruction booklet1  Platform divider to organize game pieces  EDUCATIONALStella Nova is geographically and historically accurate for the Biblical time of Christ.  So it makes a fun teaching aid for church schools and home schoolers.For instance, why are the magi on the box top wearing golden yellow robes? This was a status symbol that only the wealthy could afford. The color comes from dying the robes in saffron, which is a very expensive spice even today. The game board map is an accurate depiction of the Middle East at the time of Christ, even down to the ancient names of the cities. For example, Yathrib in Arabia is called Medina today. The town was renamed by the Muslim prophet Muhammad in 622 AD. The ancient gold mines were located in Kush. In the Middle Ages this region was called Nubia, but today it is called Sudan.  The two great centers of learning, Alexandria and Antioch, are also on the map. They along with Rome comprised the three largest cities in the Roman Empire. In science, the term “stella nova” was first used by the great astronomer Tycho Brahe.  In his book “De Nova Stella” of 1573, he disproved the Aristotelian belief in an unchanging heaven. His measurements showed that new stars, “stellae novae,” lacked the expected parallax. Today in modern astronomy, a “stella nova” is called a “super nova.” Answers to Biblical questions have citations by chapter and verse. The answers have been checked and conform with the King James version (KJV), the New Living Translation (NLT), the New Revised Standard version (NRSV), and the New American Bible (NAB). THE REWARDSThere will be games coming available for Indiegogo backers by Thanksgiving.  So we can promise that the first 1,000 games will be delivered to our backers by Christmas.$39  "The Child" - One Stella Nova game with Free Shipping in the US$72  "The Loving Couple" - Two Stella Nova games with Free Shipping in the US$99  "The Three Wise Men" - Three Stella Nova games to you wise men and women with Free Shipping in the US, Plus three "gold seal winner" stickers to attach to the games$159  "The Star" - Five Stella Nova games to you Stars with Free Shipping in the US, Plus five "gold seal winner" stickers to attach to the games$299  "The Shepherds"  - Ten Stella Nova games to you Shepherds and Pastors with Free Shipping in the US, Plus 10 "gold seal winner" stickers to attach to the games, Plus a Free DVD of the acclaimed movie "The Nativity Story" $650  "The Host of Angels" - 10 autographed Stella Nova games to you Angels with Free Shipping in the US, Plus 10 matching Stella Novas, Plus "gold seal winner" stickers to attach to the games, Plus a free DVD of the acclaimed movie "The Nativity Story," Plus dinner with the game creator in 2019 (if you are within a 2-hour drive, otherwise a gift certificate to a restaurant.) STRETCH REWARDS$15,000 -  Every Indiegogo backer will receive a "gold seal winner" sticker that can be placed on the game box.$25,000 -  Every Indiegogo backer will receive an exclusive "premier" sticker that can be placed on the game board, proving that you are an original Stella Nova backer.  And the Star, Shepherd and Angel backers will be acknowledged by name on the Stella Nova website. THE CREATORS Hello, I'm Dallen Haven, the younger part of a father and son team.  Christian created the basic design of the Stella Nova game.  Then I formulated the rules, and improved them based on the recommendations of the play-testers.  We're very grateful to all of them for the many hours they spent.   Christian then worked with the outside contractors to make the vision a reality.  Pictured below is the original "game board" sent to the first play-testers.We are so pleased to have our hand-drawn sketches converted into works of beauty by the artistic talent of our illustrator and graphics designer, Michael Spahitz, of BoardGameDesigns.com in Nevada.And we are grateful for the production expertise of our manufacturer, EPI DeLano Services of Michigan.  They are one of only three companies in all of America that could produce the game for us.  THE FUNDINGThe funds of $5,000 will be used for production, and for publicity, promotion and marketing, so that more people like you can celebrate the birth of Christ in a fun and joyous way at Christmas.  We plan to expend the funds for Internet advertising with Google, Facebook and Amazon., We hope to reach the second stretch goal, so we have funds for more games and greater exposure by advertising with Christian and Catholic periodicals and talk radio.  If we reach the third stretch goal, we plan to produce more games and market them at the Christian Products show in Atlanta and the Catholic Marketing show in Chicago.  THE RISKSThere are risks in every business venture; we have experienced marketing risks with slow growth from using word of mouth.  Now with your campaign pledges we hope to realize the vision of providing a fun way for many families and friends to celebrate the birth of Jesus at Christmastime.In our case, you will not face the design and production risks in receiving your perks.  Stella Nova is already designed and the games will be available for you the backers before the campaign is over.  However, you still face the acceptance risks of a game that may not achieve the anticipated wide-spread acclaim.

story:
The Book

Agent 8462 is an interactive puzzle book. Solve a puzzle and record the solution. All solutions in a section combine to solve the final puzzle in that section. No two puzzles are the same. Each will require a different combination of language, numeric, pattern recognition and observational skills. You can read, write, fold, cut, explore and manipulate the book however you wish to solve the puzzles.   

The Story

They made the arrest on Wednesday. Everyone thought that would be the end of it, but on Thursday you receive a delivery. 

You didn't pay any attention to it when you picked it up with the rest of the mail, placing the pile on the dining room table while you made your morning coffee. As usual, you had pressed snooze one too many times to fit in a proper breakfast. 

You sit at the table to drink your coffee while watching the news headlines. Idly sifting through the mail you notice something other than bills. An envelope, made of high quality paper, with your name and address handwritten. The contents feel thick, certainly not a couple of sheets of paper. You open the envelope to reveal a book, a note is attached:

"I need your help but you must prove you are up to the task. This book contains a series of tests to see if you have what it takes."

You grab the envelope searching frantically for clues of the books origin. No return name or address, only a strange symbol. You know this symbol, you know this is serious, you must take immediate action.

Cautiously you open the book to reveal your first test and begin your journey into the unknown.      

How to play

At the start of each section you will be provided with essential tools and information for the tasks ahead. Each two-page spread is a puzzle to solve. Record your answers as you go where it says Solution. It is important to keep an eye out for other useful clues along the way. The puzzle at the end of each section will combine all the previous section’s clues into one final task. 

Technical Details

  • Book - Paperback
  • Puzzles - 60
  • Dimensions - 9" x 6

The Creator

A puzzle enthusiast based in North West England who has spent the last year designing and redesigning potential puzzles to fit the theme and style of the upcoming book - Agent 8462: Initiation. An interactive puzzle book.

story:
A New Class of Tarot Cards

As an icon of both strength and beauty, Red Sonja is an ideal muse for navigating the mysterious and unknown world beyond ours. Whether you use them for insight into life's path, or simply enjoy the 78 unique pieces of art, the Red Sonja tarot deck will take you on a visual journey across the land of Hyrkania and beyond. 

You don't need to be a professional to use these cards! Every deck includes a complete set of Major and Minor arcana along with instructions for using the cards for your personal divination into the spiritual world. We've also improved the card stock paper to be thicker and stronger for serious tarot readers!

What's Included...

  • Beautiful, ornate box packaging
  • A complete set of 78 unique cards featuring major and minor arcana.
  • Instruction sheet explaining how to use the cards for divination.

A Closer Look...

An example of the first 22 cards of the set.

For a limited time, we're also offering our crowdfunding-exclusive edition of Vampirella tarot cards featuring 78 major and minor arcana, plus 3 bonus cards, and an exclusive package design not available at retail. Get them both for one great price!

BOTH TAROT DECKS ARE PRINTED AND READY TO SHIP ON-DEMAND!

story:
Order now at www.UltimateGameTable.com

WE CAN SHIP OTHER LOCATIONS PLEASE MESSAGE US at TableOfUltimateGaming@Gmail.com FOR MORE INFORMATION

Behold! Legions of tabletop gamers! The Table of Ultimate Gaming has arrived! Amazing features, accessories and expandability make this the gaming table we all have been waiting for. The Table of Ultimate Gaming allows you to play your games any way you choose. We create unmatched gaming table systems and accessories, then deliver them right to your door.

 

 

Mini- update section: 

Dark Walnut color stain table color update with Video click here: https://www.facebook.com/TableOfUltimateGaming/videos/1638132082904363/

#1 Green mats and Cthulhu Decoration Packs now available. Now the deco-packs include Dragon, Castle, Skulls, Celtic, and Cthulhu. Play mat choices include blue, green, red, and black. #2 All deco-packs available in natural, brown stain, grey or black foregrounds - and all colors to match mats in the backgrounds. #3 Dark Stained Wood table choice with dark laminate top added!  #4  Compact 2.4 Table of Ultimate Gaming added! This table can be a perfect small coffee table or standard small kitchen table size OR it can be added to the end of a 4'x6' table to make a longer 4'x8+" table. #5  17 4'x6' Table easily fits a full 4'x6' of battle tiles or boards THEY FIT!   #6 Compact Table of Ultimate Gaming added! We call in the 2.4 model and you can scroll down to find more info! #7 We are now offering shipping to North America, EU, UK, Australia, Singapore, Japan, South Korea. Please message us for more details. #8 Meeples decoration package and also purple mat announced.  #9 New Steampunk deco released - order this as one of the Steampunk special editions. Amazing 4 layer decoration kits included. 

 Table above consists of two 3'x5' tables combined together due to our modular design. Actual play surface of the combined tables here is 6'10" x 5'. If you want two tables just buy two and join them together either end to end or side by side to create huge playing areas. Or attach a 2.4 table to a 4.6 for a table over 8 feet long!

 The table above is our 3'x5' (3.5 model) coffee table height Table of Ultimate Gaming in natural color. Now you can add gaming to your living room or play spaces. Also this is an awesome table for puzzles!

The table above is our 3'x5' standard height in natural color. Shown with optional decoration packs and full table covers which store inside table and can be pulled out to become 4 desks! 

 420lbs standing on top of the 3.5 model Coffee Table of Ultimate Gaming

 And now, if you love the 3.5 coffee table but need a smaller version,  the more compact 2.4 model is available here! (below)

Do it for the kids and the family. Get them off the electronics for a couple hours! They LOVE it! 

You are always ready to game on the 3'x5' Coffee Table of Ultimate Gaming! 

3'x5' table in the deep play position ready for a dungeon crawl. You can build any Table of Ultimate Gaming to offer either a shallow or a deep play floor depth. 

 Take a look below at our recently added 2.4 Compact Table of Ultimate Gaming below! Available in coffee table, standard table or tall counter height table. This is the perfect table for smaller spaces! 

 

 All Tables of Ultimate Gaming can be ordered here on Indiegogo in three heights. Coffee table, standard table and tall counter top table heights. Above you can see the Compact 2.4 table in brown stain with optional full top covers which store inside the table and become two pull out desks. Perfect from a smaller living room or recreation space.

Below you can see the same Compact 2.4 table in natural color with optional full tops in standard table height. Perfect for a small game room or kitchen space!

Wow - you can go BIG TOO!! Check out the huge, epic and beautiful 4'x6' Table of Ultimate Gaming! Show with optional Skulls Decoration package!

 Dark wood with black top computer rendering below. Classy!

 Leaning, resting and playing on the Tables of Ultimate Gaming! Cup holders in use!

 

 

The Table of Ultimate Gaming is a complete modular and expandable system that puts you in the driver's seat. With unmatched features at a price you can afford, this system gives you full control over your games and events. We design on computers and cut robotically so every product is perfectly manufactured. The highest quality materials such as durable European birch hardwood construction and water based paints ensure years of safety, reliability and make these tables and accessories suitable for home use, game stores, gaming events, or game cafes and restaurants.

  • Perk table packages start at $499.00 for 2.4 (2'5"'x4' play space) compact tables. We also offer 3.5 (3'5"x5') and 4.6 (4'X6') play space tables. 
  • AC power and USB power outlets in two locations standard on every table.  
  • Each table features an adjustable height play surface. Choose a shallow depth play surface of 1.5" or a deep play surface of 3.5".  
  • You can also choose between three table heights: coffee table height, traditional height and counter-top height. Buy extra legs to convert your table to another height later. 
  • Add modular 18 piece decorations kits that swich out in an instant.
  • Add full table covers which store inside table and become 4 desks!
  • Many accessories like cup holder, card organizers, campaign screens and more are at your fingertips with the Table of Ultimate Gaming.

Intelligent design and community feedback have created not just a game table, but a gaming system that adapts to your needs and style of play. Created from imagination, designed on computers and finished by hand, the Table of Ultimate Gaming is your gateway to a thousand adventures.

Below is the 4.6 table which has a full 4x6 play surface!

 

COMBINE TABLES! Below is showing that we can combine two tables (or more) easily! This image is two 3'x5' tables combined together to create 3' wide by 10' long huge table.

COMBINE TABLES! Below is showing that we can combine two tables (or more) easily! This image is two 3'x5' tables combined together to create 6'x5' huge table.

Q:You call the smaller table a 3'x5' (play surface) but it is actually slightly larger. Why is that?

During the design process we have been looking at the production, engineering and sustainability (waste) of the Table of Ultimate Gaming. In a nutshell, in order to maximize all aspects of the tables production and usability, while minimizing waste, the smaller table (in all heights) is now about 5 inches wider and 1 inch shorter. This will come as good news to those who wanted a little more room in your tables. The smaller standard table now has a net gain of 259 sq inches. 

 

 

Many accessories are available in the Pledge bundles or as add-ons including these cup/mug holder - dice tray combo units.

 The Card Organizer is shown here below. All accessories can be positioned anywhere on the table and fit all table sizes. Also they are available in the colors which match your table. Natural wood, grey and black.

 How about a campaign/DM screen seen below? Loaded with features and mounts to the Table of Ultimate Gaming just like all the other accessories. Scroll way down the page for many more options. You can add any options to your order later, after the campaign in the post-campaign survey that we send out to you as a customer.

   Black, Natural wood and Walnut colored wood stain colors are available. 

 

Choose from three table colors for the wood: Black wood with Black tops, dark walnut wood color with black tops, and natural birch wood with white tops. The beautiful natural brown walnut stained wood option with black laminate tops shown below. Shown with optional dragon decoration.

 Brown Walnut color stain choice example. Shown with optional Meeples decoration.

 Below, you can see the huge 4'X6' Table of Ultimate Gaming From Above! Half of the optional full tables covers are installed.

  

 

                                      

 

We had two tables at GenCon and they were fantastic, rock solid and looked brand new after 4 days of hundreds of game demos and thousands of people playing, leaning, sitting and working on this. When we say they are rock solid, they are ROCK SOLID!

 

                                                                                                          

                                                                                                      

Super sturdy.

                                                                                      

                                                                                                                              

 Read below information carefully to learn about more options:

 

You can combine our tables together to create larger tables. Just purchase two tables, remove on side from one table, and a matching side from another table and combine them for a huge table. You can combine as many tables as you like! There is no limit!

Here are two 3'x5' tables joined end to end to create a 3'x10' table.

Below you can see how you can add a Compact 2.4 table to a 4.6 table to make an extra long 4' x 8'5" long table!

Below two 3'x5' tables joined side to side to create a 5'x6' table

 Here are three 3'x5' tables joined end to end to create a 3'x15' table. Three 4'x6' tables joined end to end would create a 4'x18' table.

 And here are four 3'x5' tables joined to make a huge 6'x10' table! Four 4'x6' tables would create an 8'x12' table of epic proportions.

 The point is simply this: You want a bigger table now or in the future you cannot beat the Table of Ultimate Gaming. We assure you will never outgrow our table systems.

To order more than one table just pick a pledge, add the extra table and shipping costs and you are all set! 

We currently have three table colors available. Natural birch with white tops, dark walnut stain with black tops and painted black wood with black tops. All construction of the table body structure is from the highest quality European birch hardwood. The tops are the highest quality smooth durable laminate over wood for many years of reliable service.

Natural Birch Wood - Only the best hardwoods are used.

 

 Pitch Black 4'x6' Table shown with Skull decoration

 

Brown stain show below with the Meeples optional decoration theme!

 

 Assembly is straight-forward and very easy. Only one tool is needed, a hex wrench, and we included it of course! One or two people will take 30 minutes to assemble. All tables ship in very well protected packaging.

 

 One of the most exciting aspects of the Table of Ultimate Gaming is the optional modular decoration that attached and removed in second yet remains very secure to the table. Four themes are currently available with more coming in the future! Choose from Castles, Dragons, Celtic Knots, and Skulls in decorations that match your table color perfectly! If you are not looking for special decoration, know that your basic table ships with traditional wood panels that match your tables color.

See the pledge information for more details about this exciting innovation.

 Skulls on a pitch black 4'x6' table shown with full covers

 Celtic Knots in the kitchen

 

 Part of the Castle theme

 

Meeples decoration below

 Cthulhu decoration below

 Many more available! Castles, Skulls, Dragons and more!

 Now this is exciting! You can order the same standard height Table of Ultimate Gaming in a coffee table height! Also available with all the options of it's taller brothers including decoration packs, full table top covers, cup holders, card organizers and more! This speaks for itself!

 Use any of the table pledge levels to order this style!

 

 

 Use one of the optional table top covers to divide up the play space!

 

 

 

 

 The reception to the Table of Ultimate Gaming at GenCon50 was amazing. 

 

 

We use technology and modern manufacturing like computer design/cutting and prototyping. We use Robots and Lasers. Really... We use the latest computer design and manufacturing process available at our own facility. We have full control over production and quality. So we plan on computer design, plan efficient material usage, and choose input materials engineered for value.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

Campaign NEWS!!

Decoration packs with blue backgrounds added! The three table wood colors (natural, walnut color and black) will now offer a blue background which will match the blue play mat choice!

 

Cthulhu Decoration Pack! 18 piece deco-pack that features awesome Cthulhu themed design!

 

 

 

 

Dark Stained wood option! Now choose any table in three colors! Natural Wood, Black and Dark Stain

Compact TOUG 2.4 Released!

 New Addition! - Meeples Deco and Purple Mat

 

  Initial Specs - Subject to change

 Leaning, resting and playing on the Tables of Ultimate Gaming! Cup holders in use!  The Table of Ultimate Gaming is a complete modular and expandable system that puts you in the driver's seat. With unmatched features at a price you can afford, this system gives you full control over your games and events. We design on computers and cut robotically so every product is perfectly manufactured. The highest quality materials such as durable European birch hardwood construction and water based paints ensure years of safety, reliability and make these tables and accessories suitable for home use, game stores, gaming events, or game cafes and restaurants. 

Perk table packages start at $499.00 for 2.4 (2'5"'x4' play space) compact tables. We also offer 3.5 (3'5"x5') and 4.6 (4'X6') play space tables. 
AC power and USB power outlets in two locations standard on every table.  
Each table features an adjustable height play surface. Choose a shallow depth play surface of 1.5" or a deep play surface of 3.5".  
You can also choose between three table heights: coffee table height, traditional height and counter-top height. Buy extra legs to convert your table to another height later. 
Add modular 18 piece decorations kits that swich out in an instant.

Intelligent design and community feedback have created not just a game table, but a gaming system that adapts to your needs and style of play. Created from imagination, designed on computers and finished by hand, the Table of Ultimate Gaming is your gateway to a thousand adventures.

Q:You call the smaller table a 3'x5' (play surface) but it is actually slightly larger. Why is that?
During the design process we have been looking at the production, engineering and sustainability (waste) of the Table of Ultimate Gaming. In a nutshell, in order to maximize all aspects of the tables production and usability, while minimizing waste, the smaller table (in all heights) is now about 5 inches wider and 1 inch shorter. This will come as good news to those who wanted a little more room in your tables. The smaller standard table now has a net gain of 259 sq inches.

You can combine our tables together to create larger tables. Just purchase two tables, remove on side from one table, and a matching side from another table and combine them for a huge table. You can combine as many tables as you like! There is no limit!
Here are two 3'x5' tables joined end to end to create a 3'x10' table.

Below you can see how you can add a Compact 2.4 table to a 4.6 table to make an extra long 4' x 8'5" long table!

Below two 3'x5' tables joined side to side to create a 5'x6' table

 Here are three 3'x5' tables joined end to end to create a 3'x15' table. Three 4'x6' tables joined end to end would create a 4'x18' table.

 And here are four 3'x5' tables joined to make a huge 6'x10' table! Four 4'x6' tables would create an 8'x12' table of epic proportions.

 The point is simply this: You want a bigger table now or in the future you cannot beat the Table of Ultimate Gaming. We assure you will never outgrow our table systems.
To order more than one table just pick a pledge, add the extra table and shipping costs and you are all set! 

We currently have three table colors available. Natural birch with white tops, dark walnut stain with black tops and painted black wood with black tops. All construction of the table body structure is from the highest quality European birch hardwood. The tops are the highest quality smooth durable laminate over wood for many years of reliable service.

 Assembly is straight-forward and very easy. Only one tool is needed, a hex wrench, and we included it of course! One or two people will take 30 minutes to assemble. All tables ship in very well protected packaging.

 

 One of the most exciting aspects of the Table of Ultimate Gaming is the optional modular decoration that attached and removed in second yet remains very secure to the table. Four themes are currently available with more coming in the future! Choose from Castles, Dragons, Celtic Knots, and Skulls in decorations that match your table color perfectly! If you are not looking for special decoration, know that your basic table ships with traditional wood panels that match your tables color.
